programme.title: The High Note
programme.desc: Maggie is the overworked personal assistant to Grace Davis, a superstar singer whose talent and ego have reached unbelievable heights. Stuck running errands, Maggie still wants to fulfill her childhood dream of becoming a music producer. But when Grace's manager presents her with a choice that could alter the course of her career, Maggie and Grace come up with a plan that could change both of their lives forever.

programme.title: Very Cavallari
programme.desc: As problems continue to arise at UJ, Kristin sends in Jay to observe the workflow at the office; Kristin considers bringing back a former employee, but emotions run wild when her decision doesn't sit well with the staff.

programme.title: Very Cavallari
programme.desc: Kristin and Brittainy head to Los Angeles to open up an Uncommon James Pop Shop; the Nashville, Tenn., staff is put to the test on Cyber Monday; Jay gives dating advice to Kelly; Kristin heads back to Laguna Beach to meet up with an old friend.

programme.title: Very Cavallari
programme.desc: Kristin takes an emotional trip down memory lane as she wraps up her visit in Laguna; the mean girl culture at Uncommon James comes to a head; Chuy brings everyone together for his annual block party and sets Kelly up on a blind date.

programme.title: Very Cavallari
programme.desc: Kristin takes off her boss hat when her friends come to Nashville, but everyone is left confused when Jay loses his cool; Brittainy tries to bury the hatchet with Matt; Kelly commiserates about dating in her 30s and considers freezing her eggs.

programme.title: Very Cavallari
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the awkward dinner, Kristin and Jay realize they need to make more time for each other; Brittainy's new, close friendship with Kristin creates a rift between her and the other employees; Kelly branches out on a blind date.

programme.title: Very Cavallari
programme.desc: Kristin convinces Jay to host a Little James photoshoot at their house, before they make their way to Cabo San Lucas for some fun in the sun and to work on their relationship; tension between Reagan and Brittainy cause a confrontational meeting.

programme.title: Very Cavallari
programme.desc: Things heat up when Kristin's friends join Kristin and Jay on their sizzling Cabo vacation; Reagan struggles to find direction at Uncommon James after her explosive confrontation with Brittainy.

programme.title: Very Cavallari
programme.desc: Kristin is thrown into the middle of Brittainy and Reagan's feud; Jay takes the next step toward a new venture with a business of his own; Stone pushes for commitment from Brittainy, but she spirals at the thought of marriage.

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: Unable to accept the fact that her daughter is dying, Rose (Radha Mitchell) decides to take the girl to a faith healer. On the way, the pair drive through a portal in reality, leading to an eerie town called Silent Hill. The town is surrounded by a potent darkness, and the human survivors fight a losing battle against it.

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: After moving to a new city, young Andy Barclay receives a special present from his mother -- a seemingly innocent Buddi doll that becomes his best friend. When the doll suddenly takes on a life of its own, Andy unites with other neighborhood children to stop the sinister toy from wreaking bloody havoc.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw 3D
programme.desc: Decades ago, residents of Newt, Texas, long suspected that the Sawyer family was responsible for the disappearances of many people. When their suspicions finally were confirmed, vigilantes torched the Sawyer compound and killed every member of the family -- or so they thought. Much later, a young woman named Heather (Alexandra Daddario) learns that she has inherited Texas property from an unknown relative, and she is unaware of horrors that await in the mansion's dank cellar.

programme.title: Child's Play

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The NCIS team is on the hunt for a terrorist who escaped Army custody during a secretive transfer in Los Angeles.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen races against a ruthless adversary to locate a woman who knows the whereabouts of a forgotten fortune earmarked to fund a new war in the Middle East and also holds the tantalizing key to his unknown past.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After Callen's cover is blown and it compromises the unit, the NCIS team races to find out who is behind the security breach.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A member of the team disappears while under cover; the team works alongside LAPD on a human-trafficking case that involves money laundering and drugs.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After a mysterious hit squad takes out a special agent on assignment, the NCIS team jumps into action before the next target is set.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Kensi and Deeks search for three Marines who go missing after an ambush; Nate returns from his mysterious assignment.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Marine who had top-level security clearance, and the corpse is missing a hand.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team races against time to save a naval commander's daughter after seeing a video of her being buried alive.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen's former partner (Marisol Nichols) takes hostages at a Navy recruitment center.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After terrorists kill a state department employee and a plastic surgeon, the team searches for the only witness who can identify the killers' surgically altered faces.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Terrorist leaders are suspected of murdering a retired Army sergeant; Deek connects with a person of interest in the case.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: High-school student Bella Swan, always a bit of a misfit, doesn't expect life to change much when she moves from sunny Arizona to rainy Washington state. Then she meets Edward Cullen, a handsome but mysterious teen whose eyes seem to peer directly into her soul. Edward is a vampire whose family does not drink blood, and Bella, far from being frightened, enters into a dangerous romance with her immortal soulmate.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: After the abrupt departure of Edward, her vampire love, Bella finds comfort in her deepening friendship with Jacob Black. However Bella's loyalties are put to the test as she becomes drawn into the world of werewolves, ancient enemies of vampires.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: Danger once again surrounds Bella, as a string of mysterious killings terrorizes Seattle and a malicious vampire continues her infernal quest for revenge. Amid the tumult, Bella must choose between her love for Edward and her friendship with Jacob, knowing that her decision may ignite the long-simmering feud between vampire and werewolf.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
programme.desc: At last, Bella and Edward are getting married. When Jacob finds out that Bella wants to spend her honeymoon as a human, he is horrified, for Edward's passion could accidentally kill her. Bella does indeed survive her honeymoon, but a new complication arises when she discovers that she's pregnant, and the child is growing at an alarming rate. The pregnancy sets the wolves against Bella and Edward, but Jacob vows to protect his friend.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
programme.desc: Bella awakes, as a vampire, from her life-threatening labor, and her newborn daughter, Renesmee, proves to be very special indeed. While Bella adjusts to her new state of being, Renesmee experiences accelerated growth. When the Volturi learn of the baby's existence, they declare her to be an abomination and sentence the Cullens to death. Bella, Edward and the rest of the clan seek help from allies around the world to protect their family.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kim feels pulled in two different directions as she tries to cater to both her sister and her husband during a trip; Scott tries to decide if he should surprise Kourtney by showing up in Iceland.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kim feels that Kanye is constantly misunderstood and unfairly vilified and can't decide whether to publicly take a stand for him; Kim prepares for her sexy cameo in Fergie's music video.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kim's commitment to her work engagements on Mother's Day stirs up a conflict; Scott comes down with a case of FOMO; Kim tries to resolve the tension over Kylie's endorsement.

programme.title: The Kardashians: Billion Dollar Dynasty
programme.desc: The Kardashians lead the way in harnessing social media to make stunning profits that turn them into business moguls; they go from controversy to controversy, from breaking the internet to blackfishing, but their fame and power only grows.

programme.title: Downton Abbey: A New Era
programme.desc: The Crawley family goes on a grand journey to the South of France to uncover the mystery of the dowager countess's newly inherited villa.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: High-school student Bella Swan, always a bit of a misfit, doesn't expect life to change much when she moves from sunny Arizona to rainy Washington state. Then she meets Edward Cullen, a handsome but mysterious teen whose eyes seem to peer directly into her soul. Edward is a vampire whose family does not drink blood, and Bella, far from being frightened, enters into a dangerous romance with her immortal soulmate.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: After the abrupt departure of Edward, her vampire love, Bella finds comfort in her deepening friendship with Jacob Black. However Bella's loyalties are put to the test as she becomes drawn into the world of werewolves, ancient enemies of vampires.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: Danger once again surrounds Bella, as a string of mysterious killings terrorizes Seattle and a malicious vampire continues her infernal quest for revenge. Amid the tumult, Bella must choose between her love for Edward and her friendship with Jacob, knowing that her decision may ignite the long-simmering feud between vampire and werewolf.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
programme.desc: At last, Bella and Edward are getting married. When Jacob finds out that Bella wants to spend her honeymoon as a human, he is horrified, for Edward's passion could accidentally kill her. Bella does indeed survive her honeymoon, but a new complication arises when she discovers that she's pregnant, and the child is growing at an alarming rate. The pregnancy sets the wolves against Bella and Edward, but Jacob vows to protect his friend.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
programme.desc: Bella awakes, as a vampire, from her life-threatening labor, and her newborn daughter, Renesmee, proves to be very special indeed. While Bella adjusts to her new state of being, Renesmee experiences accelerated growth. When the Volturi learn of the baby's existence, they declare her to be an abomination and sentence the Cullens to death. Bella, Edward and the rest of the clan seek help from allies around the world to protect their family.

programme.title: Downton Abbey: A New Era
programme.desc: The Crawley family goes on a grand journey to the South of France to uncover the mystery of the dowager countess's newly inherited villa.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Der japanische Ausdruck "Tsunami" bedeutet übersetzt "Welle im Hafen". Große Verwerfungen am Meeresgrund lösen diese tödlichen Überschwemmungen aus. Ein starkes Beben vor der Küste Japans verursachte 2011 einen enormen Tsunami. Doch die bisher verheerendste Flutwelle brach einen Tag nach Weihnachten 2004 über Südasien herein. Die Wassermassen hinterließen ein nie dagewesenes Maß an Zerstörung.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Einige der am dichtesten besiedelten Ballungsräume der Welt liegen in Erdbebengebieten. Tektonische Verwerfungen im Untergrund sind immer wieder seismisch aktiv - und tödlich. Mexico City erlebte auf den Tag genau 32 Jahre nach einem Megabeben eine erneute gewaltige Erschütterung. Erdbeben gehören zu den furchterregendsten Zerstörungskräften, die die Natur bereithält.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Sintflutartiger Regen, machtvoller Wind und riesige Wellen kennzeichnen die großen Wirbelstürme, die auf dem Meer entstehen. Der Hurrikan "Katrina" ging 2005 in die Geschichte ein: Als der Wirbelsturm an der Golfküste der USA auf Land traf, löste er eine traumatische Katastrophe aus. Hurrikan "Maria" zeigte 2017 auf Puerto Rico, welch unbarmherzige Gewalt die Natur entfesseln kann.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Tornados sind ein außergewöhnliches Phänomen. In den rotierenden Säulen aus Luft kann der Wind Geschwindigkeiten von mehr als 480 Kilometern pro Stunde erreichen. Tornados wurden schon auf fast allen Kontinenten beobachtet, aber eine Region ist besonders betroffen: Die "Tornado Alley" in den USA verzeichnet Jahr für Jahr ungewöhnlich viele Tornados der verheerendsten Kategorie.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Nichts kann eine Schlammlawine aufhalten. Einmal ausgelöst, walzt sie erbarmungslos alles nieder. Drei Schlammlawinen in Kalifornien, Venezuela und Wales haben in der jüngeren Geschichte besonderes Entsetzen hervorgerufen, als sie teilweise ganze Landstriche unter sich begruben.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Die Pandemie ist der unsichtbare Killer: Eine verheerende Krankheitswelle, die um den ganzen Globus wandert, wird angesichts der Bevölkerungsentwicklung immer wahrscheinlicher. So unterschiedliche Krankheiten wie Ebola und die Schweinepest zeigen, dass jeder Kontinent unvermittelt betroffen sein kann. Gesundheitsexperten sind überzeugt, dass das Risiko für eine weltumspannende Epidemie steigt.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Neben Hungersnöten zählen Flutkatastrophen zu den humanitären Krisen mit den meisten Opfern der Geschichte. Eindrucksvolle Bilder zeigen die Ursachen anhand einiger der größten Überschwemmungen in jüngerer Zeit: Am Mississippi in den USA, an der Elbe in Deutschland und in New York City entfaltete sich die unaufhaltsame Gewalt großer Wassermassen.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Vulkane regen seit jeher unsere Fantasie an. Der tragische Untergang des römischen Pompeji übt bis heute eine morbide Faszination aus. Die Vorstellung schmelzenden Gesteins in feurigen Explosionen schürt Urängste und Alpträume. Vom italienischen Vesuv bis zum Kilauea auf Hawaii - schlafende und aktive Vulkane stellen eine immerwährende Bedrohung dar.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Länder wie Saudi-Arabien sind an Hitze über 40 Grad Celsius gewöhnt. Doch als 2010 eine Hitzewelle mit ähnlichen Temperaturen über Russland hereinbrach, starben geschätzt 56.000 Menschen. Und der europäische Supersommer 2003 hinterließ rund 70.000 Todesopfer. Außergewöhnliches Bildmaterial und Klimaspezialisten gewähren einen Einblick in die genauen Zusammenhänge der beiden Hitzekatastrophen.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Klirrende Kälte und beinharte Windböen kennzeichnen den Blizzard. Die Winterstürme sind Tötungsmaschinen der Natur. Sie bringen oft riesige Mengen Schnee - aber nicht immer, wie Wetterexperten erläutern. Am Beispiel zweier Blizzards an Nordamerikas Atlantikküste zeigen sie, welche Formen extreme Kälteeinbrüche annehmen können.

programme.title: Die weiße Gefahr
programme.desc: Die weiße Gefahr - Überfüllte Pistenautobahnen sind passé: Immer mehr Wintersportler verlassen trotz Lawinengefahr das ausgewiesene Skigebiet. Wie schnell sie ihren Leichtsinn mit dem Leben bezahlen können, ist vielen nicht bewusst. Dabei fordert der "weiße Rausch" allein in den Alpen jährlich etwa 120 Tote. Als größter Risikofaktor gilt der Mensch selbst...

programme.title: Vulkanismus in Deutschland
programme.desc: Der Geysir von Andernach ist mit über 60 Meter Höhe DIE Attraktion der Osteifel.

programme.title: Die letzten Schwammtaucher
programme.desc: Über Jahrhunderte war die griechische Insel Kalymnos Hochburg der Schwammtaucher. In der ganzen Welt galten sie als tollkühne Taucher mit erstaunlichem Lungenvolumen. Heute sterben die Schwämme im Mittelmeer. Umweltverschmutzung und Klimaerwärmung werden dafür verantwortlich gemacht. Wenn aber die Schwämme sterben, was wird dann aus den berühmten Schwammtauchern von Kalymnos?

programme.title: Die Schatzsucher von Ischia
programme.desc: Früher fuhren Giulio Lauro und sein Sohn Gaetano aufs Meer, um vor der Küste Ischias Fische zu fangen. Der Erlös reichte kaum zum Leben, das Geschäft lief mit der Zeit immer schlechter. Heute haben die Lauros keine Fische, sondern Touristen an Bord. Denn inzwischen spüren sie in der Bucht vor Ischia Ponte nicht Makrelen und Kalmare, sondern Artefakte der Antike auf.

programme.title: Survivalcamp
programme.desc: Wenn die Natur zur Herausforderung wird: Abenteuer-Fans lernen, wie man in der Wildnis überlebt.

programme.title: Tödliche Naturgewalten
programme.desc: Der japanische Ausdruck "Tsunami" bedeutet übersetzt "Welle im Hafen". Große Verwerfungen am Meeresgrund lösen diese tödlichen Überschwemmungen aus. Ein starkes Beben vor der Küste Japans verursachte 2011 einen enormen Tsunami. Doch die bisher verheerendste Flutwelle brach einen Tag nach Weihnachten 2004 über Südasien herein. Die Wassermassen hinterließen ein nie dagewesenes Maß an Zerstörung.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Die frischlackierte Porsche-Karosse wartet bei Lundt in Berlin auf das Motorfinish, während Manni von den Minis Hamburg eine durchgerostete Tür wieder auf Vordermann bringt. Neue Achse und Bremsen, Edel-Felgen - Frischekur für den Bulli in Tom's Roadhouse. In der Roller-Werkstatt der Flying Classics ist heute Abschied angesagt: Die schwarze Vespa kehrt heim zu ihrem italienischen Besitzer.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Die Restaurierung des Porsche 911 ist abgeschlossen. Werkstatt-Chef Thomas Lundt persönlich übernimmt die erste Probefahrt. Leistungsstark und tiefergelegt präsentiert sich auch der top überholte T1 von Tom's Garage. In Hamburg prüft Blechroller-Profi Helge, ob die Vespa-Silberpfeil straßentauglich ist. Fummelig geht's heute bei den Minis Hamburg zu. Die restaurierte Tür muss wieder in den Wagen.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Neues Projekt, viel Arbeit. Werkstatt-Chef Thomas Lundt hat einen alten Porsche angeschleppt. Den Flying Classics aus Hamburg haben es Kultmopeds angetan. Besonders beliebt, die Ost-Marke Simson. In Tom's Roadhouse wird heute eine antike Vorkriegs-Limousine begutachtet: ein Steyr 220. Abschied bei den Minis Hamburg. Der TÜV-fertige Youngtimer wartet auf die stolze Besitzerin.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: In Tom's Roadhouse soll ein achtzigjähriger Ford ein paar PS zulegen, während die Porsche-Experten von 9elf einen äußerst seltenen Carrera 3.0 auf dem Weg zur erfolgreichen Hauptuntersuchung betreuen. Bei Il Motore steht ein Kellerfund vor der Entkernung: neuer Motor für einen alten Fiat 500. Eine top erhaltene DDR-Simson S50 findet ihren Weg zu den Spezialisten der Flying Classics.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Der Name ist Programm: Bei Il Motore dreht sich fast alles um Antriebsmaschinen. Minustemperaturen für die luftgekühlte Rarität von 9elf: Eisstrahlung beim Carrera 3.0. In der Halle der Flying Classics wartet ein schick überholtes Kultmoped auf die Abholung. Für eine Handvoll PS mehr muss sich der betagte Ford in Tom's Roadhouse von seinem Getriebe verabschieden.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Korrosion mit Coolnessfaktor: Auf dem Hof der Flying Classics landet eine Simson Schwalbe im Rost-Design. Die Porsche-Experten von 9elf verpassen dem frisch gestrahlten Carrera ein komplettes Check-up. In der Werkstatt von Il Motore wirkt strahlender Sand wahre Wunder. Motortausch für eine amerikanische Legende: In Tom's Roadhouse wartet ein Mustang auf seine neue Maschine.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Für den Carrera schlägt die Stunde der Wahrheit. Wird das edle Sammlerstück dem kritischen Prüfer-Blick standhalten? Der Il Motore-Chef jagt einen asiatischen Kultflitzer Marke Datsun auf den Leistungsstand. Geduldsprobe für den Vespa-Experten: Die Kupplung einer alten spanischen Vespa wird zum Problemfall. Auch die Montage des neuen Mustang-Motors wird zur kniffligen Herausforderung.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Das Team 9elf steigt um. Statt mit Porsche geben die PS-Experten im VW-Beetle Gas auf der Rennstrecke. Ein betagter Italiener muss sich beweisen. Läuft der bei Il Motore überholte Fiat-Motor problemlos? In Tom's Roadhouse bekommt das Ford-Hot Rod seine Achsen zurück. Wird die Problem-Kupplung der spanischen Vespa nach furioser Feinarbeit der Flying Classics wieder funktionieren?

programme.title: The Price Is Right
programme.desc: "Come on down!" "The Price Is Right" -- hosted by Bob Barker until 2007 and Drew Carey thereafter -- features a wide variety of games and contests with the same basic challenge: Guess the prices of everyday (or not-quite-everyday) retail items. Four contestants, all of whom are seated in one of the wildest audiences in daytime game-show history, are called to the stage to play a preliminary pricing round. That winner joins the host on stage for one of more than 70 different pricing games. After three such games, the contestants spin a big wheel -- hoping to get as close to $1 as possible -- in the "Showcase Showdown." The two highest winners of that round advance to the final, where prizes could be cars or roomsful of furniture. A trio of models presents the prizes.

After three such games, the contestants spin a big wheel -- hoping to get as close to $1 as possible -- in the "Showcase Showdown." That's repeated in the second half of the show, and two highest winners of that round advance to the final, where prizes could be cars or roomsful of furniture. Models present the prizes.

programme.desc: Join the International Fellowship of Christians and Jews to ease suffering of elderly Jews in war-torn Ukraine and provide a survival food box. Save Holocaust survivors who can't afford both food and medicine.

programme.title: Temptation
programme.desc: Host Rossi Morreale welcomes three contestants who accumulate cash winnings by correctly answering a series of questions about pop culture and current events. programme.title: The Price Is Right
programme.desc: "Come on down!" "The Price Is Right" -- hosted by Bob Barker until 2007 and Drew Carey thereafter -- features a wide variety of games and contests with the same basic challenge: Guess the prices of everyday (or not-quite-everyday) retail items. Four contestants, all of whom are seated in one of the wildest audiences in daytime game-show history, are called to the stage to play a preliminary pricing round. That winner joins the host on stage for one of more than 70 different pricing games. After three such games, the contestants spin a big wheel -- hoping to get as close to $1 as possible -- in the "Showcase Showdown." The two highest winners of that round advance to the final, where prizes could be cars or roomsful of furniture. A trio of models presents the prizes.

programme.title: Match Game

programme.title: Card Sharks
programme.desc: This show from legendary Mark Goodson-Bill Todman Productions features two contestants trying to predict answers to survey questions for the opportunity to play a game with oversized playing cards for a chance to win cash. One contestant guesses how many people (out of 100) gave a certain answer to a question and the other contestant then guesses if the number is higher or lower than the opponent's guess. The winning contestant then faces a row of cards and must determine if each succeeding card is higher or lower than the one that precedes it. The contestant who wins two out of three games wins the match and plays the bonus round, called Money Cards. The Money Cards round is similar to the card game in the main game but with three levels of cards instead of one row. The contestant is given $200 at the beginning of Money Cards and wagers any or all of that money when guessing if the cards will be higher or lower than the previous one. A perfect round could earn the contestant $28,800.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Manchester, and voice artist and film extra Matt hosts. He cooks up a Jewish Friday night supper, including his mum's traditional chicken soup and hopes it will be meaty enough for his guests.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Manchester, and budding author and mum of five Cleona is next to host. She is confident a menu based on her Jamaican roots will get her guests onside and hopes it will be enough to bag her the one thousand pounds.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Australian radio content director James is next to host in Manchester. He hopes some Chinese cuisine and his mum's cake recipe can create harmony and win the approval of his guests.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: The Glimmer Man
programme.desc: A former government operative renowned for his stealth, Jack Cole (Steven Seagal) is now a Los Angeles police detective. When a series of horrible murders occurs in the metro area, Cole is assigned to the case, along with tough-talking fellow cop Jim Campbell (Keenen Ivory Wayans). Although the two men clash, they gradually become effective partners as they uncover a conspiracy linked to the killings, which also involves terrorism and organized crime.

programme.title: Most Wanted
programme.desc: U.S. Sgt. Dunn (Keenen Ivory Wayans) is sentenced to death for a crime he didn't commit, but he gets a second chance when Lt. Col. Grant Casey (Jon Voight) handpicks him for a dangerous secret mission. Unfortunately, Dunn soon finds out that his assignment is a setup, and he is framed for the murder of the president's wife. Dunn goes on the run from the law with Dr. Constantini (Jill Hennessy), who knows the true identity of the assassin. But Casey will do anything to silence the pair.

Multi-Platinum hip hop star DMX stars as the powerful and mysterious crime lord Latrell Walker, whose dicey connections and seemingly unlimited cash make him everyone's target. Together the two men take on a conspiracy that reaches all the way through the ranks to the heart of the precinct.

programme.title: Brick Mansions

Surrounding the area is a giant wall to keep the rest of Detroit safe. For undercover cop Damien Collier (Paul Walker), every day is a battle against corruption as he struggles to bring his father's killer, Tremaine (RZA), to justice. Meanwhile, Damien and an ex-con named Lino (David Belle) work together to save the city from a plot to destroy it.

programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: The notorious Kowloon Walled City serves as a fortified, lawless safe haven for gangs and refugees alike. But when a skilled underground fighter runs afoul of the most feared Triad boss in Hong Kong, a bounty is placed on his head.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From `Dirty Harry' and `The Godfather' to the deeply imperfect gang from the `Fast and the Furious' franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: It's been nearly a decade since Tarzan, also known as John Clayton III, left Africa to live in Victorian England with his wife Jane. Danger lurks on the horizon as Leon Rom, a treacherous envoy for King Leopold, devises a scheme that lures the couple to the Congo. Rom plans to capture Tarzan and deliver him to an old enemy in exchange for diamonds. When Jane becomes a pawn in his devious plot, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Doc's violent, bank-robbing cronies, including Buddy, Bats and Darling, get in and out of Dodge before it's too late. He's not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick O'Connell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

His web of lies works, but when he meets Palmer (Brooklyn Decker) -- the gal of his dreams -- she resists involvement. Instead of coming clean, Danny enlists Katherine (Jennifer Aniston), his assistant, to pose as his soon-to-be-ex-wife. Instead of solving Danny's problems, the lies create more trouble.

programme.title: Blended
programme.desc: Recently divorced mom Lauren (Drew Barrymore) and widowed dad Jim (Adam Sandler) let their friends push them into a blind date, which goes disastrously wrong. Unsurprisingly, neither wants to see the other ever again. However, fate intervenes when both Jim and Lauren, unbeknown to each other, purchase one-half of the same vacation package at a South African resort; they and their children are forced to share the same suite and participate in a slew of family activities together.

programme.title: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: NFL Matchup
programme.desc: An NFL Films production, "NFL Matchup" is definitely a show for football junkies. Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.title: The Pulse: Texas A&M Football
programme.desc: "The Pulse: Texas A&M Football" is an all-access pass to Mike Elko and the Aggies team, all from the comfort of your living room. The 12th Man Productions team takes you behind the scenes of Aggie football -- from the hard work put in on the practice fields and in-game emotions to locker room speeches and off-the-field fun. "The Pulse" walks you through the week-by-week lives of the Aggie football players. The 30-minute show premieres every game week throughout the season. Elko and his staff embrace the grind as they prepare for another season in the SEC.

Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: The Pulse: Texas A&M Football
programme.desc: "The Pulse: Texas A&M Football" is an all-access pass to Mike Elko and the Aggies team, all from the comfort of your living room. The 12th Man Productions team takes you behind the scenes of Aggie football -- from the hard work put in on the practice fields and in-game emotions to locker room speeches and off-the-field fun. "The Pulse" walks you through the week-by-week lives of the Aggie football players. The 30-minute show premieres every game week throughout the season. Elko and his staff embrace the grind as they prepare for another season in the SEC.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Behind Patrick Mahomes, whose journey from son of a baseball player to starter quarterback is already notable, the Chiefs kick off their bid for a third straight Super Bowl title.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

programme.title: The Undercover Police Scandal: Love and Lies Exposed

programme.title: Night Vision

Back on the yacht, Judi makes chargrilled vegetables with halloumi and a chilli mint dressing.

programme.title: Simply Raymond Blanc
programme.desc: The chef shares recipes for his favourite dishes, including Swiss chard gratin, duck breast with marmalade, Vichy-style carrots and sweet potato, and artichoke barigoule. programme.title: You Bet! on Tour
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts the game show as it travels around the UK to find ordinary people taking on extraordinary challenges for the chance to win £5,000. Celebrity panellists Alex Brooker, AJ Odudu, and Ryan and Adam Thomas predict if the challengers can complete the tasks with which they are faced.

programme.title: Minions

Animated comedy, with the voices of Sandra Bullock, Pierre Coffin, Jon Hamm and Michael Keaton.

programme.title: Nisha Katona's Home Kitchen

programme.title: Jumanji

Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.

programme.title: ITV News and Weather

programme.title: Win Win
programme.desc: Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins host a dramatic finale as the studio players and home viewers who have secured their place on Millionaire's Row battle it out to win the £1,000,000 jackpot. Discover if the risk that the contestants took to trade their prizes in earlier episodes pays off, or if they are left regretting that decision by leaving with nothing.

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Quiz game show hosted by Lee Mack in which the questions have nothing to do with remembering facts, but are all about logic and common sense. A hundred contestants begin every show, but who will make it to the end and answer a question only one per cent of the country can get right - and win up to £100,000?

programme.title: Romesh Ranganathan's Parents' Evening
programme.desc: Comedy game show in which celebrities team up with family members, with the parents choosing which questions their children will answer and gambling on how many they can get right. programme.title: ITV News and Weather

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: News, sport and weather from across Scotland.

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Royal Kitchen Gardens
programme.desc: Raymond visits Hillsborough Castle in Co Down, the official royal residence in Northern Ireland. programme.title: M&S: Dress the Nation
programme.desc: AJ Odudu and Vernon Kay host the semi-final as the amateur designers try to impress guest judge Lily Cole, with the model joining M\u0026S lead designers and customers to decide who goes through to the final for the chance of winning the life-changing prize.

programme.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
programme.desc: James is joined by singer Rick Astley, and there are recipes from chefs Simon Hulstone and Ryan and Liam Simpson-Trotman, as well as advice from forager Alysia Vasey.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines.

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan are actor Michael Brandon, All Creatures Great and Small star Rachel Shenton, and musical theatre star Simon Lipkin. Plus, florist Simon Lycett shows off some dahlias and food and drink expert Jonathan Phang throws a cheese and wine party.

programme.title: Fern Britton: Inside the Vet's
programme.desc: Fern meets Bailey, a lovable senior Labrador with a puzzling limp, scrubs up for surgery with veterinary surgeon Andy, who is performing a keyhole spay operation on exuberant Hungarian vizsla Etty, and celebrates the everyday heroes giving rescue dogs a fresh start with a visit to a Bristol dog sanctuary.

programme.title: Talking Royals
programme.desc: Lucrezia Millarini hosts the weekly round-up of royal news, with expert analysis from ITV News' royal editor Chris Ship and expert Lizzie Robinson, and guests.

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines.

programme.title: The Living Daylights
programme.desc: James Bond crosses the continents to help a KGB agent to defect to the West. While protecting him from an unknown assassin, the super-spy is drawn into the world of arms dealing and a plot to trade millions of pounds' worth of diamonds for weapons to supply mercenaries around the world. Action adventure, with Timothy Dalton making his debut appearance as 007, alongside Maryam d'Abo, Joe Don Baker and Art Malik.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Adolescent wizard Harry is unexpectedly chosen to represent Hogwarts School in a prestigious magical tournament, despite being legally too young to enter. Along with charming sixth-year student Cedric Diggory, Harry takes on the champions of two other magical academies visiting the school, facing deadly monsters in a series of death-defying challenges. Meanwhile, the followers of the dreaded Lord Voldemort plot to restore their master to the land of the living. Fourth instalment of the fantasy saga, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Robbie Coltrane, Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Brendan Gleeson and Robert Pattinson.

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines.

programme.title: M&S: Dress the Nation
programme.desc: AJ Odudu and Vernon Kay host the grand final as the three remaining designers go head-to-head in their biggest challenge yet by creating their own full collections and showcasing their designs in a star-studded catwalk event. They need to impress not only M\u0026S lead designers in this finale, but three fashion experts David Gandy, Jodie Kidd and Marco Capaldo, before one is crowned champion and wins a life-changing chance to work alongside M\u0026S.

programme.title: Beat the Chasers
programme.desc: Jenny 'the Vixen' Ryan, Anne 'the Governess' Hegerty, Shaun 'the Dark Destroyer' Wallace, Mark 'the Beast' Labbett, Paul 'the Sinnerman' Sinha and Darragh 'the Menace' Ennis come together to take on more contestants from across the country. Can any of them come out on top? Bradley Walsh hosts.

programme.title: Frauds
programme.desc: With Sam reeling and Bert desperately trying to keep control, the heist is thrown off track when trouble from home catches up with Bilal. Crime thriller, starring Suranne Jones and Jodie Whittaker.

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In the sequel to Batman Begins, the masked hero finds a new ally in his war on organised crime in Gotham's crusading new district attorney, Harvey Dent. However, both men are pushed to their limits by the rise of the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos and destruction throughout the city for his own amusement. Comic-book thriller, starring Christian Bale, Aaron Eckhart and an Oscar-winning Heath Ledger.

programme.title: Motorsport UK
programme.desc: Richard John Neil presents action from Knockhill, including the Wera Tools F4 British Championship and Porsche Sprint Challenge Great Britain.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: News, sport and weather from across Scotland.

programme.title: Nisha Katona's Home Kitchen
programme.desc: On the menu this time are a chicken and apricot biryani, a plate of beer-battered onion bhajis with a cold mango and mint lassi, and a childhood favourite of fish finger sandwiches served with a gherkin raita. Plus, Nisha prepares for an annual party.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the children's story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.desc: The Hoods are a group of kids who love to play fantasy games on a patch of land they call the kingdom. However, when plans emerge to develop the area into a leisure facility, they must find a way to save their beloved playground before it's too late.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens' novel, `Oliver Twist', as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her Māori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a séance for a writer suffering from writers block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

programme.title: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats' leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: There's trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptune's crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBob's boss, is the culprit. Though he's just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krab's life.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: Fibs, pranks and manoeuvres take centre stage amid a 14-year-old habitual liar's bizarre confrontation with an obnoxious filmmaker who is in dire need of a blockbuster.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April O'Neil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesn't go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: In wartime Britain, one of two boys looking for a crashed Nazi German aeroplane needs to be rescued from drowning by its pilot, leading them to wonder what the right thing to do is.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2
programme.desc: Best friends meet, a mischievous dummy who brings his ghoulish friends back to life, just in time for Halloween. As the town becomes overrun with monsters, the boys join forces to save the town from Slappy's wicked plan.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: When a boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home, his imagination runs wild as his life begins to change in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter can't seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: After his latest play flops, JM Barrie finds distraction when he befriends the Llewelyn Davies family, four young boys and their widowed mother Sylvia. His relationship with them threatens his marriage and standing in society, but results in the creation of `Peter Pan'.

programme.title: Small Soldiers

When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: After his latest play flops, JM Barrie finds distraction when he befriends the Llewelyn Davies family, four young boys and their widowed mother Sylvia. His relationship with them threatens his marriage and standing in society, but results in the creation of `Peter Pan'.

programme.title: Save The Cinema
programme.desc: A Welsh hairdresser starts a campaign in the 90s to save her small town's theatre. With the help of a local politician, they manage to get Steven Spielberg to show a premier of 'Jurassic Park' in a bid to save the cinema.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistler's Mother' painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Focusing on a young Willy Wonka and how he came to meet the Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author RL Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Bart's successful stage musical based on Dickens's tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.
