When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: There's trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptune's crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBob's boss, is the culprit. Though he's just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krab's life.

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith team up to try to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Focusing on a young Willy Wonka and how he came to meet the Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: The Neverending Story
programme.desc: When a lonely young boy begins reading books from a strange bookshop in the back streets of his home town, he is transported to the magical kingdom of Fantasia, which is created by the dreams and imagination of people on Earth, but the land is in danger, and Bastian must find a way to help the Fantasian hero, Atreyu, save his world.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Peter Pan leads Wendy and her two brothers on an adventure involving Captain Hook and his band of pirates.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Bart's successful stage musical based on Dickens's tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friend's killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unravelling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Legendary pet detective Ace Ventura returns for another adventure when he's coerced out of retirement while on a soul-searching retreat in the Himalayas. He must now retrieve an endangered white bat from a village located in Africa. The sacred animal was offered up as a wedding dowry from the Wachootoo prince to the Wachati princess, and, if Ace can't track down the culprit behind the kidnapping in time, civil war will break out between the two rival tribes.

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live' skit.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: After being kicked out of his apartment by his girlfriend, Steven hears that if he slips a cable guy $50, he can get hooked up with free cable - but at what further cost? Can Steven gently reject the cable guy's insane attempts to be best buds and also get his girlfriend back?

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Legendary pet detective Ace Ventura returns for another adventure when he's coerced out of retirement while on a soul-searching retreat in the Himalayas. He must now retrieve an endangered white bat from a village located in Africa. The sacred animal was offered up as a wedding dowry from the Wachootoo prince to the Wachati princess, and, if Ace can't track down the culprit behind the kidnapping in time, civil war will break out between the two rival tribes.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: After returning to his Hawaiian home, a soldier takes a job with a tourist bureau against the advice of his parents.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies', everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In 1960s London, an aimless, amoral young man exploits the women with whom he becomes intimately involved, until something happens to make him reconsider his existence.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: After returning to his Hawaiian home, a soldier takes a job with a tourist bureau against the advice of his parents.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: After being kicked out of his apartment by his girlfriend, Steven hears that if he slips a cable guy $50, he can get hooked up with free cable - but at what further cost? Can Steven gently reject the cable guy's insane attempts to be best buds and also get his girlfriend back?

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protégé hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In 1960s London, an aimless, amoral young man exploits the women with whom he becomes intimately involved, until something happens to make him reconsider his existence.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies', everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: A writer is trying to fly from New York to Savannah, Georgia, where he is due to be married in two days' time. However, the plane crashes during take-off and the writer inadvertently saves the life of one of his fellow passengers, a free-spirited woman. She then accompanies him as he tries to continue his journey by rental car, train and bus - but he is beset by one disaster after another.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: Dumb & Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owner's kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protégé hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA agent comes up against a duplicitous American government during his quest to nab a Colombian drug lord.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: A teenage girl wants revenge on the man who killed her father, but she needs help from legendary one-eyed marshal `Rooster' Cogburn, and a Texas Ranger.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embarks on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindler's efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindler's efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officer's unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleone's 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, a Harvard symbologist is surprised to be approached by the Pope's emissaries for help. Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder in Paris' Louvre Museum and cryptic clues in some of Leonardo da Vinci's most famous paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery. For 2,000 years a secret society closely guards information that -- should it come to light -- could rock the very foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Angels & Demons

Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Dapper Danny Ocean is a man of action. Less than 24 hours into his parole from a New Jersey penitentiary, the wry, charismatic thief is already rolling out his next plan. He follows three rules: do not hurt anybody, do not steal from anyone who does not deserve it, and play the game like you have got nothing to lose. With those in mind, Danny works to orchestrate the most sophisticated, elaborate casino heist in history, targeting three establishments owned by the man who is dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: A mother leans on her horn at the wrong time, to the wrong guy. Road rage doesn't begin to describe what he's about to do to her and everyone she knows.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz

programme.desc: S7 E6 Cyril Lignac s'invite chez vous pour vous faire redécouvrir le plaisir de cuisiner en famille. programme.title: Les Traîtres
programme.desc: Mentaliste, auteur de roman policier, chanteurs, comédiens, streameur, humoriste, ancienne ministre ou ex-sélectionneur de l’équipe de France : ils sont 16 à entrer dans le jeu, prêts à tout pour décrocher les lingots au profit de leur association mais aussi pour enfin faire vaciller les traîtres.

programme.title: Les traîtres
programme.desc: S5 E7 La finale Après le quatrième épisode, deux Traîtres avaient été démasqués coup sur coup par le reste des joueurs pour lesquels l'espoir est grand de voir enfin les Loyaux l'emporter après quatre échecs. Malmenées, Anne-Elisabeth Blateau, Danielle et Frédérique Bel espèrent bien parvenir à rester dans l'ombre.

programme.title: Les Traîtres
programme.desc: Après une saison riche en émotions et en stratégies, les candidats de la cinquième saison des Traîtres se retrouvent autour d'Éric Antoine pour un rendez-vous exceptionnel. Au programme : des séquences inédites, des face-à-face explosifs entre les joueurs, des coulisses du tournage...

programme.title: Les traîtres
programme.desc: S5 E8 The Reunion Après une saison riche en émotions et en stratégies, les candidats de la cinquième saison des Traîtres se retrouvent autour d'Eric Antoine. Au programme : des séquences inédites, des face-à-face explosifs entre les joueurs ainsi que des coulisses du tournage. Traîtres et Loyaux reviennent sans filtre sur leurs choix et expliquent leurs coups les plus marquants. Entre révélations, anecdotes et ultimes trahisons, l'aventure est loin d'être terminée.

programme.title: Et Si On Se Rencontrait ?
programme.desc: Suivez les incroyables histoires d’amour de ces couples qui ont craqué virtuellement l’un pour l’autre, et qui se rencontrent pour la première fois en vrai. Cette fois, c’est au château de Serans, dans l’Oise, que ces amoureux virtuels vont passer du fantasme à la réalité.

programme.title: Et Si On Se Rencontrait ?

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: S1 E3 Des hommes et des femmes entretiennent une vraie relation en ligne depuis des mois voire des années. Mais est-il possible de tomber amoureux d'une personne à distance ? Aujourd'hui, ils ont décidé de franchir le pas, de passer du fantasme à la réalité et de se rencontrer.

programme.title: E=M6
programme.desc: e=m6 est LE magazine scientifique familial par excellence pour apprendre de manière ludique au travers d'expériences visuelles, de témoignages, de décryptages de spécialistes qui répondent aux questions que tout le monde se pose….

programme.title: Zone Interdite
programme.desc: C’est une première en France ! L’ouverture de deux prisons de haute-sécurité conçues pour enfermer les deux-cents narcotrafiquants les plus dangereux de France.

programme.title: Enquête Exclusive
programme.desc: La France produit près de 340 millions de tonnes de déchets par an, un des volumes les plus élevés d’Europe. En marge des filières légales, 35 000 dépôts sauvages prolifèrent sur tout le territoire.

programme.title: Enquête Exclusive
programme.desc: En 2022, le nombre d’arnaques à domicile a explosé. Huit millions de Français ont été dépouillés chez eux. C’est deux fois plus qu’il y a dix ans. Pour tromper la vigilance de leurs victimes, les escrocs redoublent d’imagination.

programme.title: Enquête Exclusive
programme.desc: Le procureur de Bobigny dresse un constat alarmant : en Seine-Saint-Denis en 2024, le nombre d’homicides liés au narcotrafic a triplé, 15 morts, et les tentatives d'homicides, 73, sur fond de stupéfiants ont explosé.
