programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: The garden is accidentaly wrecked when Dennis tries to give Gnasher a bath, so the gang have to fix the mess before Mum comes home. Followed by 'Run Rabbit Run'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis makes a line of practical jokes for Mr. Scrimp, called 'The Menace Collection.' However, Dennis soon learns that it will put Mr. Har Har out of business.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Walter takes up origami as a martial art, Dennis scoffs and comes up with his own martial art, and so the two prepare to battle it out. Followed by 'Smelling of Roses'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After watching a film about an alien invasion, Dennis, Curly and Pie Face decide to make their own film. However, Walter stumbles across them filming, and he only sees the action, not the camera. Filming what he sees on his mobile phone, he runs to tell the whole of Beanotown about the alien invasion. As panic spreads, Dennis and his friends discover the chaos and decide to keep filming in order to help make the best of their own alien film. Meanwhile, Sergeant Slipper investigates the alien landing that Walter has seen, and discovers the truth—that the spaceship is a playhouse with glow sticks in it. Followed by 'Castle in the Air'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis and his pet dog, Gnasher, live by just one rule: Kids should make all the rules! Followed by Dance of the Seven Pies.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 'Fish Tale'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: For a school project, Dennis and Walter both build robots. However, during an accident, both robots merge, causing Dennis and Walter to defend the school. Followed by 'No Joke.'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: With one backstage pass for a Ratbucket gig, Dennis and his friends pass themselves off as Ratbucket, only for the real Ratbucket not to be able to play at his own concert. Followed by 60 second Dennis and 'Bad Dad'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Dennis breaks his bike, Dad is unable to afford a new one, so Dennis convinces him to ask his boss for a raise. Unfortunately, Mr Scrimp reduces his wages instead. Dennis then trashes his house to convince Scrimp that his family are poor, so that Mr Scrimp will feel compelled to raise Dad's wages. Just as Scrimp has been taken in by Dennis' plan, Mum and Dad arrive home laden with shopping bags, resulting in Dad getting fired on the spot. Dennis resolves to get Dad his old job back by secretly causing chaos at his office. To restore order Scrimp rehires Dad, sealing the deal with a generous pay rise. Mum and Dad repair the house, but still don't have enough money to buy Dennis a new bike, instead it gets repaired with Dad's office rubber bands and paperclips. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dennis Hiccups'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Believing Gnasher and Gnipper to be trapped in Beanotown Dog Pound, Dennis comes up with a plan to rescue his friends and bring them both home. Followed by more Dennis and Gnasher episodes.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: When Dennis breaks his skateboard again, Dad agrees to buy Dennis the best skateboard there is as a replacement if he is able to win a prize at the upcoming school award ceremony. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dance of the Seven Pies'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis tries to get a birthday present by saying thank you to his relatives. However, because of Dennis' naughty personality, they take his attempts in a negative way. Followed by 'Dennis Hiccups'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Masters of the House'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After a wrestling accident, Gnasher swallows a canister of laughing gas at the vet's. Dennis, along with Gnasher hide in the conference centre, where dad gives a speech. However, the canister leaks, causing Gnasher to fart laughing gas and having everyone laughing. Followed by 'Attack of the Walterbot'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis and Co. have to control Pie Face's obsession with pies during the Pie Festival. Otherwise, they will be grounded. Followed by 'Great Outdoors'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: On a school trip, Dennis finds out that he is descentant to a warrior tribe. He also discovers that Montanna Smith (a famous Indiana Jones-esque explorer and one of Walter's personal heroes) is actually a thief who's trying to steal the treasure of Dennis' ancestor. Will he be stopped before he gets his hands on the treasure? Followed by Dog Tired.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Mum has bought curtain material for the soon to be newly decorated kitchen, and asks Dad to look after it while she is out. However, Dad falls asleep and mistakenly agrees that Dennis can use it as a giant sail. When Dad realises that it has gone, he calls Dennis to bring it back, but unfortunately Dennis gets into a spot of bother with the colonel, who takes the curtain material off Dennis. In an attempt to steal it back, the garden being wrecked and the kitchen is left looking like a bombsite. Dennis, Gnasher and Dad have to clean up the whole kitchen and redecorate it in time for Mum returning. When Mum decides it is time to hang the new curtains, Dennis is about to get the curtain material, but Mum reveals that she has changed her mind and bought new curtains instead. Followed by 'Fangs for the Memories'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, his friends and Walter's friends get marooned on a desert island when Dennis attempts to escape a boring field trip. Followed by Substitute Creecher

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis plays a prank on the citizens of Beanotown, causing them to evacuate, which causes trouble for Dennis later. Followed by 'No Place Like Home'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Gnasher and Gnipper enter a dog show, regardless of Walter saying they don't have true talent. He wants Athena and Miss Mini Wuff to win, but Walter has just underestimated Gnasher's true capabilities. Followed by Grounded.

programme.desc: Gnasher and Gnipper enter a dog show, regardless of Walter saying they don't have true talent. He wants Athena and Miss Mini Wuff to win, but Walter has just underestimated Gnasher's true capabilities. Followed by Grounded.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Athena gets Gnasher envy when seeing a pampered version of Gnasher in a magazine and when she hears that Dennis owns an Abyssinian wire-haired tripe hound (Gnasher), she wants him. However, being an owner to Gnasher isn't all cracked up to be! Followed by 'Splash'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Believing Gnasher and Gnipper to be trapped in Beanotown Dog Pound, Dennis comes up with a plan to rescue his friends and bring them both home. Followed by more Dennis and Gnasher episodes.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: When Dennis breaks his skateboard again, Dad agrees to buy Dennis the best skateboard there is as a replacement if he is able to win a prize at the upcoming school award ceremony. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dance of the Seven Pies'

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf On Wood: The evil wizard Gargamel once again meets Esmeralda, the gypsy fortune-teller, and she finds a novel way of getting the gold coin that Gargamel imprudently shows her. But the Smurfs in their turn are tricked into believing there is such a thing as a good-luck tree...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Forget-Me-Smurfs: Little Sickly turns into a hero when he forgets his ailments and saves the rest of the Smurfs from the deadly forget-me flowers.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Shadow: Accidents do happen. This time it is Jokey Smurf's mistake that ends up with his shadow coming to independent life! And the shadow loves to play practical jokes on the whole population of the Village of the Smurfs...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lazy's Slumber Party: Poor Lazy! All he wants is a good night's rest. But no, all the Smurfs throw a party for him and, what's more, he gets dragged into a silly argument about painting giant Bigmouth's toes a bright tangerine red... It's a long, sleepless night for poor Lazy Smurf!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Puppy: Homnibus gives the Smurfs a dog that they name Puppy. The playful, normal-sized animal likes his new home, but Balthazar captures him, thinking that the Smurfs' magical secrets are in Puppy's collar. The Smurfs rescue the dog and Baby finds only music in the collar's locket.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Garagmel's Time Trip: Gargamel steals Father Time's hourglass in an effort to travel into the past and destroy the Smurfs, whom he blames for his failure in life. His plans are thwarted when Bigmouth shows up and breaks the spell, which only lasts if Gargamel is not seen by anyone.

programme.title: Secret Of The Village Well
programme.desc: Why is Clumsy Smurf waiting day and night near the Village well? What is the wish that he wants to be kept secret? How is Gargamel going to be mixed up in this mysterious affair? Is Gargamel going to catch the Smurfs at last?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Squeaky: This is the dramatic, moving story of the friendship between Smurfette and her pet mouse. A sad event reduces Smurfette to tears... Can the Smurfs comfort the despairing Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity Smurf receives when he breaks his toe, Jokey Smurf feigns sickness in hopes of getting recognition. Unfortunately, his ploy turns against him and instead of loving care all he receives is the proverbial pound of curse.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Viking: The Smurfs take Grandpa Smurf to the King's castle so that he can meet Peewit. But what with one thing and another (especially another), the Smurfs and Peewit are taken aboard a Viking long ship. The Vikings take Peewit to be their mythical Great Warrior, the one who is going to vanquish the Storm King. Can the Smurfs help Peewit out of his quandary?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Once In A Blue Moon: Once in a blue moon, as the legend goes, a baby Smurf is delivered to the Smurfs and everyone in the village becomes attached to the new arrival. But a mistake has been made and the stork returns to take the baby back. Grouchy and Smurfette have become so attached to the baby that the baby is returned.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Marco Smurf And The Pepper Pirates: The Smurfs sail off in their sailing boat to save Marco Smurf, who has been captured at sea by Captain Pepper. Marina and a dolphin help to free Marco.

programme.title: Brainy Smurf, Friend To All Animals
programme.desc: Brainy dons his safari hat and roams the forest to do good deeds for animals. He mostly gives advice to the creatures but balks when he can really save the life of a wildcat being hunted by Gargamel. Nat gives Brainy the courage to free the cat from Gargamel's trap.

programme.title: The Village Vandal
programme.desc: Nasty wizard Gargamel has had enough of the Smurfs' permanent superiority. He decides to destroy their Village once and for all. This is why he trains a termite to ravage, demolish, devastate and raze all the houses in its path. But the effect is even worse than Gargamel imagined as the Smurfs think that their Village is being torn apart by the antics of the Smurflings.

programme.title: Monster Smurfs
programme.desc: This is spook-a-Smurf eve, and all the Smurfs get ready for the fancy dress party… But Brainy Smurf gets hold of Papa Smurf's Book of Magic, and all the Smurfs are changed into hideous but funny creatures. Yet danger lurks...

programme.title: A Gift For Papa's Day
programme.desc: Gargamel steals Papa Smurf's birthday hat to lure the Smurfs into a trap. Papa tricks Gargamel into releasing them and then keeps the unusual hat to remind everyone of their great escape.

programme.title: Symbols Of Wisdom
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf desperately wants to be more like Papa Smurf. Can a hair tonic be the answer? Can Gargamel be able to finally capture the Smurfs? Does wisdom really reside in a beard?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Springtime: The wicked wizard Gargamel asks the sorcerer Balthazar for a recipe to capture the Smurfs. It involves kidnapping Mother Nature to stop the arrival of Spring. Luckily, the Smurfs save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Loss Of Smurfs: When the emergency call rings, all the Smurfs in the Village drop what they are doing and run to hear the news. But when Vanity Smurf calls for an assembly so that the Smurfs can admire his new hat, it is too much. They send him on his way out of the village, and Vanity has the bad luck of meeting Lofty, the Elf, who suggests a horrible mud bath...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy Goes On Strike: Get up early in the morning, before any other Smurf is out of bed, to prepare a scrumptious Smurfberry muffin. Spend all morning on preparing Smurf delicacies for lunch. Than all afternoon to have dinner ready – and delicious – on time. And do you get so much as a thank you form the Smurfs? So Greedy Smurf quits. The Village is in trouble... And soon, so is Greedy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sweepy Smurf: Sweepy the chimney sweep Smurf is not the most popular inhabitant of the Village of the Smurfs. He is rather messy, and the clouds of soot that he makes certainly don't add to his popularity. Only the Smurflings find him great company as he's the only one who can get dirty and not be told off. Yet in their enthusiasm for Sweepy, the Smurflings endanger the Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - It's A Puppy's Life: The evil wizard Gargamel has got hold of magical ectoplasmic crystal eggs that will enable him to change bodies with Papa Smurf. What better plan could there be? Disguised as Papa Smurf, he's going to lead all the Smurfs to his cauldron! But as fate would have it, Gargamel is changed into Puppy, the Smurf doggie...

programme.title: Heavenly Smurfs
programme.desc: Once again, Gargamel's infallible plan to catch the Smurfs has been foiled. But the Smurfs play a trick on him: disguised as tiny blue angels, they will teach him to mend his ways...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Forget-Me-Smurfs: Little Sickly turns into a hero when he forgets his ailments and saves the rest of the Smurfs from the deadly forget-me flowers.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Miracle Smurfer: The Smurfs learn that the mind is more powerful than matter when they are fooled by a quack's outrageously expensive miracle tonic. But Papa Smurf cures the Smurfs of their temporary naiveté and the charlatan of his villainy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Christmas: The Smurfs come to the rescue of two children and their grandfather when a mysterious stranger appears and causes their sleigh to crash. Knocking on Gargamel's door for help puts them and the Smurfs in danger…

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Every Picture Smurfs A Story: The evil Maestro's magical paints have the power to transport his models onto canvas – forever! Papa Smurf directs Painter to switch his paints and before long, Maestro is enshrined in a picture next to his dream girl, Smurfette.

programme.title: Beauty Is Only Smurf Deep
programme.desc: Periwinkle, a vain Pixie, is upset when her magic mirror tells her that Vanity is the fairest, not she. Periwinkle kidnaps Vanity, but the rest of the Smurfs come to Vanity's rescue. Periwinkle sees the error of her ways and they become friends.

programme.title: Bringing Up Bigfeet
programme.desc: Remember Bigmouth, the ogre, and his lovely wife Bignose? They have a baby now: tiny (by ogre standards) Bigfeet. As the Smurflings Snappy, Slouchy and Nat, and of course the ever-willing Sassette are not entitled to baby-sit Baby Smurf, they volunteer to watch over Bigfeet, while its parents are at the Ogre Ball. The little Smurfs will get more than what they expected...

programme.title: Wedding Bells For Gargamel
programme.desc: The Smurfs befriend a maiden in distress who is betrothed to Gargamel by convincing her father that the foolish wizard is insane.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sister Smurf: Smurfette has found a new friend, Laura, a six-year-old child whose parents live near the forest. Together, the two girls wander in the forest. But an old witch who lives in the forest catches them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lazy's Slumber Party: Poor Lazy! All he wants is a good night's rest. But no, all the Smurfs throw a party for him and, what's more, he gets dragged into a silly argument about painting giant Bigmouth's toes a bright tangerine red... It's a long, sleepless night for poor Lazy Smurf!

programme.title: Snappy's Way
programme.desc: Did you know that if you catch a troll, he may grant you one wish? It just happens that Aloysius the Troll gets caught in one of Gargamel's Smurf traps. Snappy Smurf sets him free and as a reward, gets to make all other Smurfs obey his every whim. Now this brings a lot of trouble to the Smurfs, as Smurflings, sometimes, ask for things that are not good for them... or anybody else.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Pet For Baby Smurf: There is a prize for the cutest pet of a Smurf. Baby Smurf brings a cute, lovely, affectionate Glowing Darling, a pet anybody falls in love with… But this pet is a creation of Gargamel, the evil wizard intent on destroying the Smurfs!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Tallest Smurf: Smurfs are three apples high. Smurflings are twenty-five smurfberries high. Except for Slouchy, who only measures twenty-two smurfberries. Apart from Baby Smurf, Slouchy is the shortest Smurf, and the jibes and taunts of the other Smurflings make him wish he were the tallest of the Smurfs... Now it so happens that Gourdy the Genie loves to grant wishes...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Mere Truffle: The Smurfs love truffles but truffles belong to the Trolls and the Trolls live under Truffle Troll Mountain, where in the shadows of the lake lurks the Thing with No Name...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Lost City Of Yore: Curiosity brings Nosey Smurf to the lair of the Hag Sisters, who want to find the terrifying Sceptre of Yore... And Gargamel wants to cheat the two witches as he tries to destroy the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Pussywillow Pixies: Clumsy Smurf's misadventures take him across a river into Pussywillow Hollow. There he meets the Pixies – charming and shapely beings whose enemies, the Wartmongers, will meet the Smurfs in some unforeseen ways.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Mutiny On The Smurf: King Symphonium sends his pelican, Satchelmouth, to scoop up Brainy's orchestra and carry them to his island. Dreamy takes the helm of a ship to set sail for their rescue. When Dreamy gets seasick, Brainy takes command and leads the rescue party that frees the captured Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Golden Tresses: Hogatha, the repulsive witch, captures the Smurfette. She wants to steal from the little blue beauty her golden hair. Can the Smurfs save their little female companion before it is too late? Can Hogatha grow hair like Smurfette's?

programme.title: Educating Bigmouth
programme.desc: The Smurfs try to teach Bigmouth about romance, manners, and getting a job after Bignose kicks him out. He returns to her refined, but Bigteeth is courting Bignose. Bignose realizes what she was missing and takes Bigmouth back to live happily ever after.

programme.title: Queen Smurfette
programme.desc: Smurfette becomes Queen for a day on her birthday. But this gets out of hand when Father Time falls asleep, neglecting to end the days. Tempers begin to flare among the Smurfs, who are tired of servitude. Papa rushes to wake Father Time and brings peace again to Smurfland.

programme.title: Smurf On The Run
programme.desc: Little things can sometimes bring about big effects. In trying to catch Sassette, Gargamel upsets the Balance of Truth, and from then on everybody in the world tells lies. Even Papa Smurf is changed into a pathological liar. What is more, the Spirit of the Scales chain Gargamel and Sassette to each other, and together they have to replace the Topaz of Truth....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Royal Drum: No one believes Grandpa Smurf when he tells of far-away jungles and savannahs teeming with wild giant cats, striped horses, long-necked leaf-eaters and strange tribes... Only some Smurflings give some credit to his tales. But when Grandpa Smurf hears the sound of the magic Royal Drum in the forest, the one that can tame wild beasts, he sets out to prove that he's not an old addle-brained storyteller.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Scarlet Croaker: Greenpeedeepee Swamp is the only place you can find Swamp Root, the delicious and necessary ingredient of Greedy Smurf's famed swamp root stew. Unfortunately, it is also one place where you can find those hideous Wartmongers. Even though Sassette and the Smurfs save a young Wartmonger's life, they still end up being captured by the others. But the Scarlet Croaker will save them! Maybe.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fountain Of Smurf: The Smurfs discover a fountain of youth that is guarded by a wicked troll, who steals Papa Smurf's magic book. They convince Gargamel to help them and the greedy villain runs to get the water, but manages to fall in with the troll. As the two chase each other all over the countryside, the Smurfs are able to retrieve Papa Smurf's book.

programme.title: Skyscraper Smurfs
programme.desc: Sure, a village of mushroom-shaped houses is nice and jolly... But not very modern, in Architect Smurf's view. What the Smurfs need is smurfdominium, a new, daring concept that will change the art of living forever...

programme.title: Snappy's Way
programme.desc: Did you know that if you catch a troll, he may grant you one wish? It just happens that Aloysius the Troll gets caught in one of Gargamel's Smurf traps. Snappy Smurf sets him free and as a reward, gets to make all other Smurfs obey his every whim. Now this brings a lot of trouble to the Smurfs, as Smurflings, sometimes, ask for things that are not good for them... or anybody else.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Winged Wizard: Determined to fly over Smurf village to catch a Smurf to take to the Wizard's Convention, Gargamel invokes his Book of Spells to help him. A series of funny flying machine mishaps occur and Gargamel is once more the laughing stock of the Wizard's Convention.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bigmouth's Friend: Gargamel and Balthazar command a giant robot to force King Gerard to hand over Clockwork Smurf. When the robot is about to destroy the castle, Clockwork's new, large, and awkward friend Bigmouth defeats the robot. Clockwork is hurt in the battle but Handy fixes him and implants a voice box so he can say "Hi"!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Time Capsule: As the Smurfs busily build a time capsule for all of their talents, Papa Smurf frantically tries to unravel an ancient Druid riddle before disaster strikes the forest.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Viking: The Smurfs take Grandpa Smurf to the King's castle so that he can meet Peewit. But what with one thing and another (especially another), the Smurfs and Peewit are taken aboard a Viking long ship. The Vikings take Peewit to be their mythical Great Warrior, the one who is going to vanquish the Storm King. Can the Smurfs help Peewit out of his quandary?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sassette: Snappy and Nat steal Gargamel's formula to make another Smurf – a female to be a companion to Smurfette. They create Sassette, who causes mischief wherever she goes. Papa uses his Smurfiness Solution to turn Gargamel's evil Sassette into a playful Smurfy Sassette.

programme.title: Smurfiplication
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel creates a magic formula that duplicates everything it touches. And surprise! Suddenly there are six Brainy Smurf! This creates a few interesting situations in the Village... And also at Gargamel's!

programme.title: The Gargoyle Of Quarrel Castle
programme.desc: In Quarrel Castle, you almost never hear a kind word. Both Selwyn the Warlock and Tallulah, his witch-mate, spend their time quarrelling. Tharp, their pet gargoyle, takes refuge in the Village of Smurfs. But something terrible is going to happen....

programme.title: Don Smurfo
programme.desc: Everyone has their own dreams. That of Smurfette is to meet the legendary Don Smurfo, the dashing, witty, swashbuckling hero of many an engrossing tale. The Smurfs shrug at this infatuation. But when a real-life Don Smurfo appears in the village and Smurfette snubs them all in favor of the bragging stranger, they take the matter a little more seriously.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Flighty's Plight: Flighty Smurf, as his name implies, can't make his own mind up about anything. The other Smurfs take him to the forest for a survival test in which he can find his way home only by making decisions. He ends up in Balthazar's castle.

programme.title: Spelunking Smurfs
programme.desc: The starving Smurfs discover a cave that has a stash of frozen food inside guarded by an equally frozen troll who was imprisoned because of his greed by a magic diamond. As the Smurfs defrost the cave, Gargamel steals the food, but the magic diamond transforms him into an icy mass and the freed troll happily helps the Smurfs carry the food back to their village.

programme.title: Speak For Yourself, Farmer Smurf
programme.desc: Farmer hides his love for Smurfette by assuming a disguise and sending her poems. When they finally meet, they are captured by Bigmouth and in their struggle to get free, they discover their mutual friendship.

programme.title: Revenge Of The Smurfs
programme.desc: A war is raging in the Middle Ages. Knights in armor in hot pursuit inadvertently destroy the Smurfs Village so a small band of Smurfs decide to avenge this wrongdoing. Won't Papa Smurf think this is too human-like a reaction?

programme.title: Brainy Smurf, Friend To All Animals
programme.desc: Brainy dons his safari hat and roams the forest to do good deeds for animals. He mostly gives advice to the creatures but balks when he can really save the life of a wildcat being hunted by Gargamel. Nat gives Brainy the courage to free the cat from Gargamel's trap.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Lost City Of Yore: Curiosity brings Nosey Smurf to the lair of the Hag Sisters, who want to find the terrifying Sceptre of Yore... And Gargamel wants to cheat the two witches as he tries to destroy the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hopping Cough Smurfs: The evil wizard Gargamel spreads the forest with the germs of the uncontrollable hopping cough. Baby Smurf is the first victim and all the Village of the Smurfs goes frantic with worry... Fortunately, Papa Smurf thinks there might be a cure.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Prince And The Hopper: What is that strange talking frog that Morlock the Wizard sends all of Prince Theodore's soldiers to catch? Is it a demon frog, as he says, or something else? Truth will out when Smurfette and the Smurflings meet the frog. They help to change this frog back into Prince Theodore himself, for he's been the victim of a spell cast by Morlock.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Puppy Prescription: Gargamel conjures a spell that makes Puppy think he's a cat. Papa receives a prescription from Homnibus to reverse the spell and all the Smurfs help. As Puppy becomes a dog again, Gargamel gets too close and he becomes a cat.

programme.title: Clumsy Luck
programme.desc: The Smurfs learn about superstition when Clumsy breaks Vanity's mirror prior to a meteor shower. When a meteor falls on Clumsy's house, everyone attributes it to bad luck, but realize the foolishness of this philosophy when they see Clumsy was not in the house at the time.

programme.title: The Colour Smurf
programme.desc: Spectra is the Colour Fairy, the one whose wheel of colours make all the blues, reds, yellows and greens of the world. She is a friend of Painter Smurf, so when he takes the Smurflings to her home in her absence, the Smurflings fool around with the Colour Wheel... and all the colours disappear from the Earth. What's worse, without colours the Colour Fairy cannot live...

programme.title: A Gift For Papa's Day
programme.desc: Gargamel steals Papa Smurf's birthday hat to lure the Smurfs into a trap. Papa tricks Gargamel into releasing them and then keeps the unusual hat to remind everyone of their great escape.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tick Tock Smurfs: The village of the Smurfs used to live without a clock. But now suddenly time becomes a precious commodity and Brainy Smurf designs a schedule to take advantage of the new Village clock... Can the Smurfs survive the attacks of time?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa Smurf, Papa Smurf: Yes, there can be too much of a good thing. When an accident happens to Papa Smurf's magic formula and he ends up multiplied by two, the Smurfs are elated: two Papa Smurfs can give twice the good counsel and twice the loving that one can. But after a while, things get too complex in the Village. Especially when another accident doubles the number of Gargamels!

programme.title: La Ventana
programme.desc: When young Tommy (Bobby Driscoll) sneaks out of his bedroom and onto the fire escape of his tenement building, he sees two neighbors, Joe (Paul Stewart) and Jean Kellerson (Ruth Roman), murder a sailor (Richard Benedict). Tommy, who has been reprimanded before by his parents for telling phony stories, informs his mother (Barbara Hale) of the crime, but she does not believe him. After his mother leaves to attend to a sick relative, Tommy worries that the Kellersons will try to kill him, too.

programme.title: StarDog and TurboCat
programme.desc: Launched into space in 1969, a loyal dog crash-lands in a small town where pets are no longer welcome. Desperate and confused, he soon recruits the help of a tech-savvy cat to help him reunite with his beloved owner.

programme.title: The Philadelphia Story
programme.desc: This classic romantic comedy focuses on Tracy Lord (Katharine Hepburn), a Philadelphia socialite who has split from her husband, C.K. Dexter Haven (Cary Grant), due both to his drinking and to her overly demanding nature. As Tracy prepares to wed the wealthy George Kittredge (John Howard), she crosses paths with both Dexter and prying reporter Macaulay Connor (James Stewart). Unclear about her feelings for all three men, Tracy must decide whom she truly loves.

programme.title: The Brink
programme.desc: A reckless police inspector is on a mission to crack down on a criminal's gold smuggling scheme.

programme.title: Paradox - Kill Zone Bangkok
programme.desc: A tough Hong Kong cop's teenage daughter disappears in Pattaya. He goes to Thailand to find her and must deal with corrupt cops, but an honest one helps him track down culprits involved in illegal organ trafficking.

programme.title: Back to Bataan
programme.desc: This World War II film sees American army colonel Joseph Madden (John Wayne) stationed in the Philippines with much of his military support forced out of the region by Japanese troops. Despite the grim situation, the tenacious Madden attempts to rally Filipino guerrilla fighters to continue assaults on the Japanese. Among Madden's band of soldiers is Captain Andres Bonifacio (Anthony Quinn), who struggles with the burden of being the grandson of a war hero.

programme.title: Brothers Karamazov
programme.desc: Based on Fyodor Dostoevsky's novel, Fyodor Karamazov (Lee J. Cobb) is a wealthy and controlling father who must choose an heir among his four sons. Dmitri (Yul Brynner), the oldest son, is engaged to Katya (Claire Bloom) but starts seeing his father's mistress, Grushenka (Maria Schell). The other brothers, Ivan (Richard Basehart), Alexey (William Shatner) and half-brother Smerdyakov (Albert Salmi), all have designs on the inheritance, ultimately leading to betrayal and murder.

programme.title: Quo Vadis
programme.desc: Returning from a military campaign abroad, General Marcus Vinicius (Robert Taylor) discovers that a new religion has taken hold in Rome: Christianity. When Vinicius encounters Lygia (Deborah Kerr), a follower of the strange religion, he quickly becomes smitten and tries to win her affections. Lygia is reluctant due to their differing beliefs. Complicating matters is the crazed Emperor Nero (Peter Ustinov), who blames the Christians for his own burning of Rome, beginning a wave of persecution.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Based on a story by famed science fiction writer Philip K. Dick, "Minority Report" is an action-detective thriller set in Washington D.C. in 2054, where police utilize a psychic technology to arrest and convict murderers before they commit their crime. Tom Cruise plays the head of this Precrime unit and is himself accused of the future murder of a man he hasn't even met.

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
programme.desc: In this classic adventure film, two rough-and-tumble wanderers, Dobbs (Humphrey Bogart) and Curtin (Tim Holt), meet up with a veteran prospector, Howard (Walter Huston), in Mexico and head into the Sierra Madre mountains to find gold. Although they discover treasure, they also find plenty of trouble, not only from ruthless bandits lurking in the dangerous Mexican wilderness but from their own insecurities and greed, which threaten to bring conflict at any moment.

programme.title: Infection

programme.title: Back to Bataan
programme.desc: This World War II film sees American army colonel Joseph Madden (John Wayne) stationed in the Philippines with much of his military support forced out of the region by Japanese troops. Despite the grim situation, the tenacious Madden attempts to rally Filipino guerrilla fighters to continue assaults on the Japanese. Among Madden's band of soldiers is Captain Andres Bonifacio (Anthony Quinn), who struggles with the burden of being the grandson of a war hero.

programme.title: Brothers Karamazov
programme.desc: Based on Fyodor Dostoevsky's novel, Fyodor Karamazov (Lee J. Cobb) is a wealthy and controlling father who must choose an heir among his four sons. Dmitri (Yul Brynner), the oldest son, is engaged to Katya (Claire Bloom) but starts seeing his father's mistress, Grushenka (Maria Schell). The other brothers, Ivan (Richard Basehart), Alexey (William Shatner) and half-brother Smerdyakov (Albert Salmi), all have designs on the inheritance, ultimately leading to betrayal and murder.

programme.title: Quo Vadis
programme.desc: Returning from a military campaign abroad, General Marcus Vinicius (Robert Taylor) discovers that a new religion has taken hold in Rome: Christianity. When Vinicius encounters Lygia (Deborah Kerr), a follower of the strange religion, he quickly becomes smitten and tries to win her affections. Lygia is reluctant due to their differing beliefs. Complicating matters is the crazed Emperor Nero (Peter Ustinov), who blames the Christians for his own burning of Rome, beginning a wave of persecution.

programme.title: Top Hat
programme.desc: The story centers on wealthy Dale Tremont (Ginger Rogers), on holiday in London and Venice. She assumes that American entertainer Jerry Travers (Fred Astaire) is the husband of her friend Madge (Helen Broderick) -- who's actually the wife of Jerry's business manager Horace Hardwick (Edward Everett Horton).

programme.title: Beasts That Cling to the Straw
programme.desc: The destinies of numerous lowlifes converge and come crashing down.

programme.title: Easter Parade
programme.desc: In this lavish musical, Broadway star Don Hewes' (Fred Astaire) dancing partner (Ann Miller) goes solo, and Don declares that he can make a hit performer out of the next dancer he sees. This turns out to be the inexperienced Hannah (Judy Garland), who bristles as Don tries to make her into his old partner. But as he realizes that he is falling in love with Hannah, Don knows that he must let her grow into her own kind of dancer if he wants her to reach her full potential.

programme.title: Esperando la carroza
programme.desc: Mama Cora's four children argue over who should be forced to care for her in her old age.

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: Nick Smith (Cecil Kellaway), a middle-aged roadside diner owner, hires a drifter, Frank Chambers (John Garfield), to work at his restaurant. Frank quickly begins an affair with Nick's beautiful young wife, Cora (Lana Turner), and the two conspire to kill Nick and seize his assets. When they succeed, local prosecutor Kyle Sackett (Leon Ames) becomes suspicious, but is unable to build a solid case. However, the couple soon realizes that no misdeed ever goes truly unpunished.

programme.title: Infection
programme.desc: A man races against time to save his son when a new rabies virus turns people into rampaging zombies in Venezuela.

programme.title: A Face in the Crowd
programme.desc: Ambitious young radio producer Marcia Jeffries (Patricia Neal) finds a charming rogue named Larry "Lonesome" Rhodes (Andy Griffith) in an Arkansas drunk tank and puts him on the air. Soon, Rhodes' local popularity gets him an appearance on television in Memphis, which he parlays into national network stardom that he uses to endorse a presidential candidate for personal gain. But the increasingly petulant star's ego, arrogance and womanizing threaten his rise to the top.

programme.title: The Day They Robbed the Bank of England
programme.desc: An Irish patriot (Aldo Ray) and his 1901 gang use an old sewer to reach Bank of England gold bullion.

programme.title: East of Eden
programme.desc: In this film based on John Steinbeck's epic novel, Cal Trask (James Dean), the son of a California farmer (Raymond Massey), feels that his father cares only about his brother, Aron (Richard Davalos). When Cal embarks on a business venture to gain the favor of his dad, he finds himself dealing with his estranged mother (Jo Van Fleet), now the owner of a brothel, and tensions in the family rise even further when he begins to fall for Aron's girlfriend, Abra (Julie Harris).

programme.title: Taxi 5
programme.desc: A Marseille police officer must take down a group of Italian robbers who drive powerful Ferraris with the older niece of Daniel, the driver of the legendary white taxi.

programme.title: Mr. and Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: When David Smith (Robert Montgomery) concedes to his wife, Ann (Carole Lombard), that he's not quite satisfied with their marriage, the couple's relationship spins into disarray. In the wake of David's confession, Ann learns that because of a legal snafu, they're not actually married. Ann uses her freedom to try the dating market, where she's courted by Jeff Custer (Gene Raymond), one of David's professional colleagues. David's attempts to win her back lead to several humorous situations.

programme.title: The Postman Always Rings Twice

programme.title: The Wrong Man
programme.desc: Musician Manny Balestrero (Henry Fonda) needs money to pay for his wife Rose's (Vera Miles) dental procedure. When he tries to borrow money from their insurance policy, someone at the office mistakes him for a man who had robbed them twice at gunpoint. After Manny is arrested, his defense attorney, Frank O'Connor (Anthony Quayle), works to demonstrate that Manny has an alibi for the crimes. The stress of the case, however, threatens to destroy Manny's family before his name can be cleared.

programme.title: The Mating Game
programme.desc: Uptight IRS man Lorenzo Charlton (Tony Randall) is ordered to investigate rural rancher Pop Larkin (Paul Douglas), who is significantly in debt to the government. Lorenzo arrives in the country and is shocked to discover that Pop and his family are so oblivious to financial concerns they haven't ever bothered to do their taxes. Some moonshine, however, and Pop's lovely daughter, Mariette (Debbie Reynolds), help Lorenzo learn to relax, and he decides to help the Larkins' find a legal loophole.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: The March sisters -- Meg (Janet Leigh), Jo (June Allyson), Beth (Margaret O'Brien) and Amy (Elizabeth Taylor) -- struggle to make ends meet in their New England household while their father is away fighting in the Civil War. Despite harsh times, they cling to optimism, often with neighbor Laurie (Peter Lawford) as a companion. As they mature, they face burgeoning ambitions and relationships, as well as tragedy, all the while maintaining their unbreakable bond.

programme.title: Red Tails
programme.desc: During World War II, the Civil Aeronautics Authority selects 13 black cadets to become part of an experimental program at the Tuskegee Institute in Alabama. The program aims at training colored personnel to become fighter pilots for the Army. However, discrimination, lack of institutional support and the racist belief that these men lacked the intelligence and aptitude for the job dog their every step. Despite this, the Tuskegee Airmen, as they become known, more than prove their worth.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Arthur, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Arthur must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep sea.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: After failing to defeat Aquaman the first time, Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother, Orm, the former king of Atlantis. Setting aside their differences, they join forces to protect their kingdom and save the world from irreversible destruction.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: When a crime brings them back to the mean streets of Los Angeles, fugitive ex-convict Dom Toretto (Vin Diesel) and agent Brian O'Conner (Paul Walker) reignite their high-octane feud. However, when a common enemy rears his head, Dom and Brian must learn how to work together and trust one another in order to defeat him.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: Sworn to preserve intergalactic order, the Green Lantern Corps has existed for centuries. Its newest recruit, Hal Jordan, is the first human to join the ranks. The Green Lanterns have little regard for humans, who have thus far been unable to harness the powers of the ring each member wears. But Jordan, a gifted and cocky test pilot, may be the corps' only hope when a new enemy called Parallax threatens the universal balance of power.

programme.title: Heretic
programme.desc: A diabolical Mr. Reed ensnares two young missionaries in a terrifying game of cat and mouse when they knock on the wrong door and are forced to prove their faith.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Jack Torrance (Jack Nicholson) becomes winter caretaker at the isolated Overlook Hotel in Colorado, hoping to cure his writer's block. He settles in along with his wife, Wendy (Shelley Duvall), and his son, Danny (Danny Lloyd), who is plagued by psychic premonitions. As Jack's writing goes nowhere and Danny's visions become more disturbing, Jack discovers the hotel's dark secrets and begins to unravel into a homicidal maniac hell-bent on terrorizing his family.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: With help from an eyewitness, Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case; Perry pays Maeve a visit, while Robbie puts his plan in motion; later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path.

programme.title: Uncut Gems
programme.desc: A charismatic jeweler makes a high-stakes bet that could lead to the windfall of a lifetime. In a precarious high-wire act, he must balance business, family and adversaries on all sides in pursuit of the ultimate win.

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: A disposable employee is sent on a human expedition to colonize the ice world Niflheim. After one iteration dies, a new body is regenerated with most of his memories intact.

programme.title: Evil Dead 2
programme.desc: The second of three films in the Evil Dead series is part horror, part comedy, with Ash Williams (Bruce Campbell) once again battling horrifying demons at a secluded cabin in the woods. After discovering an audiotape left by a college professor that contains voices reading from the Book of the Dead, Ash's girlfriend Linda (Denise Bixler) becomes possessed by evil spirits that are awakened by the voices on the tape. Ash soon discovers there is no escaping the woods.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat
programme.desc: Hunted by the fearsome warrior Sub-Zero, MMA fighter Cole Young finds sanctuary at the temple of Lord Raiden. Training with experienced fighters Liu Kang, Kung Lao and the rogue mercenary Kano, Cole prepares to stand with Earth's greatest champions to take on the enemies from Outworld in a high-stakes battle for the universe.

programme.title: A Private War
programme.desc: Celebrated war correspondent Marie Colvin is a woman who is as comfortable downing martinis with high society's elite as she is brazenly staring down warlords and fleeing from gunfire. Driven by an enduring desire to bear witness and give voice to the voiceless, Colvin charges into danger, constantly testing the limits between bravery and bravado.

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: With her graduation from law school imminent, Veronica Mars is interviewing with prestigious New York law firms when she gets a call from ex-boyfriend Logan, who has been accused of murder. Veronica returns to Neptune to help Logan find a good defense attorney, but when she becomes suspicious of the way Logan's case is being handled, she finds herself being pulled back into a life she thought she had left behind: that of an amateur sleuth.

programme.title: Women Is Losers
programme.desc: Celina Guerrera attempts to rise above poverty in 1960s San Francisco.

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: The discovery of a clue to mankind's origins on Earth leads a team of explorers to the darkest parts of the universe. Two brilliant young scientists lead the expedition. Shaw (Noomi Rapace) hopes that they will meet a race of benevolent, godlike beings who will in some way verify her religious beliefs, while Holloway (Logan Marshall-Green) is out to debunk any spiritual notions. However, neither the scientists nor their shipmates are prepared for the unimaginable terrors that await them.

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
programme.desc: Bound for a remote planet on the far side of the galaxy, members (Katherine Waterston, Billy Crudup) of the colony ship Covenant discover what they think to be an uncharted paradise. While there, they meet David (Michael Fassbender), the synthetic survivor of the doomed Prometheus expedition. The mysterious world soon turns dark and dangerous when a hostile alien life-form forces the crew into a deadly fight for survival.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Dom Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio) is a thief with the rare ability to enter people's dreams and steal their secrets from their subconscious. His skill has made him a hot commodity in the world of corporate espionage but has also cost him everything he loves. Cobb gets a chance at redemption when he is offered a seemingly impossible task: Plant an idea in someone's mind. If he succeeds, it will be the perfect crime, but a dangerous enemy anticipates Cobb's every move.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Forced back into the field after a family tragedy, special agent Tom Brandis leads a new task force investigating a string of robberies.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom's family prepares for an emotional court date; Robbie faces a dilemma; Maeve makes a crucial decision that might change everything.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: As Cliff and Robbie look for a buyer, Aleah and Lizzie question Peaches' former co-workers; Tom and Grasso pursue a lead.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom questions the loyalty of his taskforce; Perry probes his own gang for answers and uncovers a shocking truth.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: With help from an eyewitness, Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case; Perry pays Maeve a visit, while Robbie puts his plan in motion; later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path.

programme.title: Kiss of the Spider Woman
programme.desc: In a prison cell somewhere in Latin America, two very different men warily confront each other. Molina (William Hurt) is first seen wrapping his head in a towel, in the shape of a turban, while Valentin (Raul Julia), bearded and classically macho in appearance, watches with a mixture of fascination and revulsion. During the time spent together, the two men come to understand and respect each other.

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs
programme.desc: Jodie Foster stars as Clarice Starling, a top student at the FBI's training academy. Jack Crawford (Scott Glenn) wants Clarice to interview Dr. Hannibal Lecter (Anthony Hopkins), a brilliant psychiatrist who is also a violent psychopath, serving life behind bars for various acts of murder and cannibalism. Crawford believes that Lecter may have insight into a case and that Starling, as an attractive young woman, may be just the bait to draw him out.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Seven years have passed since Dr. Hannibal Lecter (Anthony Hopkins) escaped from custody. The doctor is now at large in Europe. Mason Verger (Gary Oldman) remembers Lecter too, and is obsessed with revenge. Verger was Dr. Lecter's sixth victim, and though horribly disfigured, has survived. Verger realizes that to draw the doctor into the open, he must use someone as bait: Clarice Starling (Julianne Moore).

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: Aspiring photographer Therese spots the beautiful, elegant Carol perusing the doll displays in a 1950s Manhattan department store. The two women develop a fast bond that becomes a love with complicated consequences.

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Some British retirees (Judi Dench, Maggie Smith, Bill Nighy) decide to outsource their retirement to exotic -- and less expensive -- India. Lured by advertisements for the newly restored Marigold Hotel and imagining a life of leisure in lush surroundings, they arrive and find that the Marigold is actually a shell of its former self. Though their new home is not quite what they had imagined, the retirees find that life and love can begin again when they let go of their pasts.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Armed with nothing but a hatful of dreams, young chocolatier Willy Wonka manages to change the world, one delectable bite at a time.

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: Handsome pharmaceutical salesman Jamie Randall (Jake Gyllenhaal) always has good luck with women. A chance encounter with Maggie Murdock (Anne Hathaway), a free-spirited Parkinson's patient, leads to a sexual relationship. As Jamie and Maggie become closer, each must question if a serious commitment is in their future.

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: Chili Palmer (John Travolta) is a Miami mobster who gets sent by his boss, the psychopathic Bones Barboni (Dennis Farina), to collect a bad debt from Harry Zimm (Gene Hackman), a Hollywood producer who specializes in cheesy horror films. When Chili meets Harry's leading lady (Rene Russo), the romantic sparks fly. After pitching his own life story as a movie idea, Chili learns that being a mobster and being a Hollywood producer really aren't all that different.

programme.title: Woman at War
programme.desc: Halla is a 50-year-old environmental activist who crusades against the local aluminum industry in Iceland. As her actions grow bolder, her life changes in the blink of an eye when she's finally granted permission to adopt a girl from the Ukraine.

programme.title: Uncut Gems
programme.desc: A charismatic jeweler makes a high-stakes bet that could lead to the windfall of a lifetime. In a precarious high-wire act, he must balance business, family and adversaries on all sides in pursuit of the ultimate win.

programme.title: The Substance
programme.desc: Fading actress Elisabeth Sparkle becomes distressed when her chauvinistic boss fires her from her aerobics show. She soon injects herself with a mysterious serum that promises a younger, better version of herself, but things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Soon after their showdown with evil spirits that possessed their son, the Lamberts, Renai (Rose Byrne) and Josh (Patrick Wilson), are ready for their lives to return to normal. However, something still is seriously off, especially with Josh, who -- unbeknown to Renai -- is possessed too. In order to free Josh's soul and finally defeat the malevolent forces around them, Lorraine Lambert (Barbara Hershey) and her ghost-hunting friends investigate the past to save her family's future.

The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.title: This Is Football

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: E60

programme.title: So finden Sie die Ewigkeit

programme.title: Eine zweite Chance für die erste Liebe
programme.desc: Kathy Yoder (Galadriel Stineman) hat ihr Leben in einer amischen Gemeinde hinter sich gelassen und reist als erfolgreiche Reiseführerautorin durch die Welt. Der Tod ihres Vaters führt sie zurück in ihr Heimatdorf – und damit in ihre Vergangenheit, die sie längst hinter sich geglaubt hat. Die früheren Freunde stehen ihr, 'der modernen Geschäftsfrau', die sich von der amischen Lebensweise abgewandt hat, allerdings sehr skeptisch gegenüber. Besonders ihre Schwester Miriam (Madison Lawlor) kann ihr nicht verzeihen, dass sie die Familie damals im Stich gelassen hat. Doch die alte Umgebung und die vertrauten Bräuche geben ihr ein lange nicht gekanntes Gefühl von Geborgenheit...

programme.title: Fuer immer Dein
programme.desc: Hayley findet Ehering und Brief in neuer Wohnung. Beschließt zurückzuschreiben.

programme.title: Romantik-Retreat
programme.desc: Dana, Journalistin auf Yoga-Retreat, trifft Stefan, im Skandal verstrickt. Zwischen Geschichte und Liebe wählen.

programme.title: Te Ata
programme.desc: Te Ata (Q'orianka Kilcher) gehört dem Stamm der Chickasaw an und ist mit ihren Liedern, Tänzen und Geschichten aufgewachsen. Ihr großer Traum ist es, auf den Bühnen des Broadway zu stehen... - Die rührende und bildgewaltig erzählte Geschichte von Mary Thompson Fisher, eine der erfolgreichsten indianischstämmigen Künstlerinnen aller Zeiten. Unter dem Künstlernamen 'TE ATA' (sprich: TAY' AH-TAH) erzählte sie die Geschichten ihres Volkes und trug damit maßgeblich dazu bei, Toleranz zu fördern und die Grenzen in den Köpfen der Amerikaner zu sprengen.

programme.title: Die Dating-Liste
programme.desc: Abby macht einen Deal: Dates für die Chefin, Beförderung für sie. Doch dann verliebt sie sich selbst.

programme.title: LondonTown
programme.desc: England 1979. Der 14-jährige Shay Baker (Daniel Huttlestone) muss schnell erwachsen werden, denn während sein Vater mit seinem Klavierladen und einem Zweitjob als Taxifahrer versucht, irgendwie die Familie über Wasser zu halten, kümmert Shay sich um den Haushalt und seine kleine Schwester. Seine Mutter hat bereits vor Jahren die Familie im Stich gelassen, um sich in London ihren großen Traum von einer Karriere als Sängerin zu erfüllen. Als Shay die Punkerin Vivian (Nell Williams) trifft, verliebt er sich nicht nur zum ersten Mal, sondern lernt durch sie auch Punkrock kennen. Besonders die Band THE CLASH hat es ihm angetan... - - Liebevoller und mit viel Zeitkolorit ausgestatteter Familienfilm mit und über die Kraft der Musik von THE CLASH! Treffend besetzt mit Jonathan Rhys Meyers (Elvis - Aufsteig und Fall des Kings, The Tudors, Dracula, Vikings) als deren legendärer Sänger/ Gitarrist Joe Strummer.

programme.title: Eine Hochzeit wie im Bilderbuch
programme.desc: Lindsey fotografiert Hochzeit von Joshs Schwester. Funken fliegen. Folgen sie dem Herzen?

programme.title: Tag X
programme.desc: Die alleinerziehende und verwitwete Tanja (Carina Diesing) wird durch die Entführung ihrer Tochter Lilly (Jolie Sarah Werner) jäh aus ihrem schwierigen Alltag gerissen, nur um einem schrecklichen Familiengeheimnis auf die Spur zu kommen... - Spannender Entführungs-Thriller um Geheimnisse, die besser im Dunkeln verblieben wären. Von den Machern der erfolgreichen Mystery Mini-Serie "Ebersberg".

programme.desc: Loredana gewährt exklusive Einblicke in ihre größte musikalische Herausforderung: Bei Red Bull Symphonic performt sie ihre Hits begleitet von einem Symphonieorchester – ein Blick hinter die Kulissen.

programme.title: Red Bull SoundClash Challenge: Bozza „Nerven aus Stahl“
programme.desc: „Übel geil!“ statt Übelkeit: Bozza kriegt gar nicht genug von den Eskapaden der Red Bull Driftbrothers. 1.000 PS, Rauch und Donuts sind anscheinend genau das Richtige für sein Nervenkostüm.

programme.title: Red Bull Symphonic
programme.desc: Classic meets drum 'n' bass with amazing 175 beats per minute – that's Red Bull Symphonic. The duo behind Camo & Krooked and the classical composer Christian Kolonovits face this challenge together.

programme.title: Rap Duell S1 E1: Celo & Abdi vs. Jamule & Reezy
programme.desc: Rap-Duell-Premiere mit dem Duo Numero Uno, Celo & Abdi, und zwei der Top-Newcomer 2020: reezy & Jamule.

programme.title: Rap Duell S2 E4: Ali Bumaye & Achi vs RebellComedy
programme.desc: Es treffen vier Szene-Größen aufeinander: Ali Bumaye und Achi der Entertainer fordern als A-Team Ususmango und Benaissa Lamroubal, die beiden Stand-up-Comedians von Rebell Comedy, als Team Bruda Was?

programme.title: Musik-Doku: Der Aufstieg des asiatischen HipHops
programme.desc: Sechs Künstler:innen aus ganz Asien erzählen, wie HipHop ihren Weg geprägt hat. Mit dabei: Suboi aus Vietnam, die sogar vor Barack Obama performte – ein Blick auf Asiens kreative Szene.

programme.title: Explorers S2 E5: Die mysteriöse Wolke
programme.desc: Hängegleiter-Pilot Jon Durand fliegt durch die Morning Glory, ein einzigartiges Wolkenphänomen.

programme.title: Mount Asgard: Die Huber Buam schreiben Geschichte
programme.desc: 2011 gelingt den Huber Buam und Mario Walder eine spektakuläre Erstbegehung: der Aufstieg auf den Mount Asgard in Kanada. Nach 28 Versuchen stehen sie endlich ganz oben am Gipfel.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush S4 E2: Slackline-Weltrekord Versuch
programme.desc: Profi-Slackliner Alex Schulz versucht den Highline-Weltrekord mit einer luftigen Traverse in China zu brechen.

programme.title: ABC of... S2 E2: Kayaking
programme.desc: Die Kayak Masterclass mit Jessica Fox führt zu den Wurzeln des Wildwassersports – mit spannenden Einblicken in Technik, Geschichte und den Pionier:innen, die Kajakfahren geprägt haben.

programme.title: Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen São Paulo 2019: Highlights
programme.desc: Das verrückteste und kreativste Rennen der Welt auf vier Rädern fand 2019 in Brasilien statt, und das passierte beim Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen in São Paulo.

programme.title: UCI MTB World Cup 2025
programme.desc: Spektakuläre Abfahrten in Loudenvielle: Gracey Hemstreet und Jackson Goldstone feiern ihre ersten Elite-Siege beim UCI MTB Downhill-Weltcup 2025 – Technik, Tempo und Triumph in den Pyrenäen.

programme.title: UCI MTB World Cup 2025
programme.desc: Der Auftakt der UCI Mountainbike Weltcup-Saison 2025 führt nach Araxá: Auf brasilianischem Terrain liefern sich die Besten der Szene packende Duelle in der Cross-Country-Disziplin.

programme.title: Windsurf Doku: The Longest Wave
programme.desc: Eine Doku des Oscar-nominierten Regisseurs Joe Berlinger über die Windsurf-Legende Robby Naish, der alles erreichte und jetzt mit Rückschlägen kämpft.

programme.title: BMX Film: Go Fast Pull Up
programme.desc: Die Evolution des BMX von den 80ern zu den 90ern. Go Fast Pull Up wirft einen Blick auf das Leben des BMX-Fahrers Jimmy LeVan und seine Rolle in der Geschichte des Sports.

programme.title: Adventure Doku: Erstbegehung des Mount Shivling
programme.desc: Vier Schweizer Alpinisten stellen sich der ultimativen Herausforderung: eine Erstbegehung des 6.543 m hohen Mount Shivling in Indien. Sie gehen an ihre Grenzen – doch erreichen alle den Gipfel?

programme.title: Magic Moments: Die besten Stunts von Danny MacAskill
programme.desc: Danny MacAskill begeistert seit Jahren mit kreativen Edits und spektakulären Stunts. Diese fünf Magic Moments zeigen, warum er zu den einflussreichsten Bike-Athleten der Welt zählt.

programme.title: Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen Australien 2023: Highlights
programme.desc: Beim Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen 2023 in Melbourne, Australien, testen kreative Teams ihre selbstgebauten Rennwagen und sorgen für Unfälle, Lacher und einen harten Wettbewerb in Down Under.

programme.title: Worldies S1 E14: 5 bizarre Events des Actionsports
programme.desc: Angefangen bei der Formel 1 über Klippenspringen bis hin zu allem, was dazwischen liegt - jedes dieser "Top-5"-Videos liefert die unglaublichsten Momente, Events und Athleten aller Actionsportarten!

programme.title: Worldies S1 E11: Adventure
programme.desc: Angefangen bei der Formel 1 über Klippenspringen bis hin zu allem, was dazwischen liegt - jedes dieser "Top-5"-Videos liefert die unglaublichsten Momente, Events und Athleten aller Actionsportarten!

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare it's found nowhere else on Earth. Once covering vast slopes of the mountain, the cedar is now critically endangered. Illegal logging, wildfires, and climate change have brought it to the brink, with only a handful of mature, seed-producing trees ever documented in recent years. Declared Malawi's national tree, the cedar has become a symbol of both loss and resilience. We explore the bold and deeply collaborative effort to bring this species back from the edge. At the core of this movement are local Malawians, young men and women who grow thousands of cedar seedlings in grassroots nurseries, carry them in woven baskets to high- altitude planting sites, and spend days traversing rugged trails to restore what's been lost. Their work is

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Die junge Therapeutin Claire wird nach einem Flugzeugabsturz von ihrem Chef beauftragt die sechs Überlebenden des Unfalls zu betreuen. Als diese ihre Erinnerungen an den Unfall zusammentragen - welcher laut den Insassen auch eine Explosion beinhalten soll, die die Airline jedoch abstreitet - ist Claire von dem geheimnisvollen Patienten, Eric, fasziniert. Als dann Claires professionelle Beziehung zu Eric - gegen ihr besseres Wissen – in einer Romanze endet, verschwinden die Überlebenden plötzlich nacheinander auf mysteriöse Weise. Claire vermutet das Eric alle Antworten auf ihre Fragen hat und ist entschlossen die Wahrheit über den Absturz herauszufinden, koste es was es wolle.

programme.title: Live: What Would You Do?
programme.desc: Using hidden cameras, host John Quiñones observes and comments on how ordinary people behave when they are confronted with dilemmas that require them either to take action or to walk by and mind their own business. Various scenarios are created that force people to make split-second -- and often surprising -- decisions, and variations of the situation (such as changing the genders, races or clothing of the people involved) are often featured to see if different reactions are elicited. Examples of situations on the show include a waitress being harassed by her boss, and a drunken valet trying to park cars.

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: One of the most profitable horror movies ever made, this tale of an exorcism is based loosely on actual events. When young Regan (Linda Blair) starts acting odd -- levitating, speaking in tongues -- her worried mother (Ellen Burstyn) seeks medical help, only to hit a dead end. A local priest (Jason Miller), however, thinks the girl may be seized by the devil. The priest makes a request to perform an exorcism, and the church sends in an expert (Max von Sydow) to help with the difficult job.

programme.title: The Creation of the Humanoids
programme.desc: When nuclear war annihilates much of the world's population, the remaining humans come to rely heavily on robotic androids to keep their fragile society afloat. Over time the androids become so alarmingly lifelike and sophisticated that Kenneth Cragis (Don Megowan) of the Order of Flesh and Blood advocates banning them. When the first-ever murder of a human by a robot occurs, many rally to Cragis' cause until it's discovered that his sister (Frances McCann) has become intimate with a robot.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: A magician hypnotizes the trio.

programme.desc: Regain independence and enjoy greater mobility with the compact design and long-lasting battery of portable oxygen.

programme.title: Overwhelmed with IRS Debt? Keys to Resolving Tax Debt
programme.desc: See how one company is changing people's lives by helping them put their tax problems to rest.
