programme.desc: Jeremy Wade investigates whether the snakehead deserves its fearsome reputation.

programme.title: Legend of Loch Ness
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade is on a mission to track down the famous Loch Ness monster.

programme.title: Chainsaw Predator
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade is in the Australian outback trying to catch the rare freshwater sawfish.

programme.title: Electric Executioner
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade is in Brazil in search of a fish that has already killed three cowboys.

programme.title: Freshwater Shark
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade investigates the myth of the freshwater shark.

programme.title: Killers from the Abyss (Part 2)
programme.desc: Fishing detective, Jeremy Wade, continues the biggest investigation of his career.

programme.title: Deep Sea Demon
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade goes in search of the truth behind the sea serpent legend.

programme.title: Japanese Horrors
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade is in Japan on the trail of the kappa, a fish about which legends abound.

programme.title: South Pacific Terrors
programme.desc: Attacks from unseen assailants in the remote mountains and jungles of Fiji's interior.

programme.title: Alligator Gar
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade heads to Texas on the trail of the vicious alligator gar.

programme.title: Alaska's Cold Water Killer
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade investigates a fatal incident in Alaska - is an unidentified killer at large?

programme.title: Skin
programme.desc: A black child born to white parents is cast out of white society in 1950s South Africa. The film follows her thirty-year journey to acceptance.

programme.title: The Beaver
programme.desc: Two-time Academy Award winner Jodie Foster directs and co-stars with two-time Academy Award winner Mel Gibson in The Beaver - an emotional story about a man on a journey to re-discover his family and re-start his life.

programme.title: Magic Beyond Words
programme.desc: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings, as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager, to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.

programme.title: Ruth & Alex
programme.desc: When Ruth and Alex opt to put their apartment on the market over one crazy weekend, they discover that finding a new apartment is not about winding down...

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.

programme.title: I Can Only Imagine
programme.desc: It's the song that brings ultimate hope to so many...often in the midst of life s most challenging moments.

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: Ashton Kutcher is Steve Jobs, the iconic Apple innovator and groundbreaking entrepreneur. This inspiring and entertaining film chronicles Jobs early days as a college dropout, to his rise as the co-founder of Apple Computer Inc.

programme.title: Bolan's Shoes
programme.desc: This story takes us on a tumultuous journey from the height of T. Rex mania in 1970s Liverpool to the present-day poignancy of what would have been Marc Bolan's 75th birthday.

programme.title: Berlin I Love You
programme.desc: Keira Knightley, Helen Mirren, Jim Sturgess, and Diego Luna head an all-star cast in this sparkling film from the team behind the popular franchise that brought you Paris, Je t'aime and New York, I Love You.

programme.title: Louder Than Words
programme.desc: After the unexpected death of their daughter, a couple work to build a state of the art children's hospital where families are welcomed into the healing process.

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: They chose the worst man for the job. They expected him to fail, but he wasn't about to let a witness be murdered on his watch. Personal demons put Jack a New York City cop at rock bottom.

programme.title: Crimebusters
programme.desc: Two penniless friends decide to rob a store--but end up instead in a police office where they are drafted as new recruits. Starring Terence Hill and Bud Spencer.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Emperor from 200 B.C. China unearths a two thousand-year-old nightmare, a secret that should have remained buried.

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: A group of friends make a remarkable discovery in a rural field - a crashed spacecraft - And there's a survivor. But when they bring the otherworldly being home, they soon discover that it holds even greater secrets than they could imagine.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as the leader of a group of German officers who hatched a plot to assassinate Hitler. The operation was code-named "Valkyrie," for the emergency plan that was meant to be used in case of a revolt against the Nazi government.

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah (Isabelle Allen), is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.

programme.title: Son of a Gun
programme.desc: JR busts out of prison with Brendan Lynch, Australia's most notorious criminal, and joins Lynch's gang for a gold heist that soon pits the two men against one another.

programme.title: Tiger House
programme.desc: When Kelly sneaks into her boyfriend's house one night, she soon discovers she isn't the only unwelcome visitor. A violent gang – lead by determined boss Shane have invaded the property and are holding the family hostage for an unknown ransom.

programme.title: The Siege
programme.desc: Walker, an international assassin, is compromised during a mission. His handler sends him to a Reassignment Center at which Walker will be processed for a new identity. During his stay at the facility, a ruthless assault team storms the compound searching for someone their boss has lost.

programme.title: Heist
programme.desc: Francis 'Pope' Silva is a popular, soon to be retiring casino owner and feared mafia boss. When one of his employees Luke Vaughn desperately needs cash for his daughter's much needed operation...

programme.title: Night Train
programme.desc: In this tightly crafted action thriller, a single mother struggling to survive agrees to run black market medical supplies in her legendary pick-up truck, "Night Train", with the FBI in hot pursuit.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

programme.title: The Arsenal Stadium Mystery
programme.desc: Classic crime drama. During a charity match between Arsenal and the Trojans, the Trojans' striker mysteriously collapses in full view of the capacity crowd. When it is discovered that he has been poisoned, Scotland Yard is called in to investigate.

programme.title: Checkpoint
programme.desc: A gunshot rings out in an Italian motor factory, the watchman lies dead and the safe door is open. As the police arrive, a figure disappears into the shadows and fires at a mercury cylinder. Who is responsible and what do they want?

programme.title: Don't Ever Leave Me
programme.desc: Jack Denton's grandfather Harry comes out of prison. He is soon up to his old tricks: embarrassment and chaos follow.

programme.title: Frightened City
programme.desc: The 'protection racket' is rampant in London. The basic procedure for the crooks is to threaten shop-keepers and café proprietors with the destruction of their premises unless they pay a regular weekly sum of money for 'protection'.

programme.title: The Hornet's Nest
programme.desc: Story of how two young models take over a barge moored off Chelsea in which crooks have hidden the proceeds of a large-scale jewel robbery.

programme.title: Fear in the Night
programme.desc: It took Penny Heller a long time to recover from the trauma of a brutal physical assault, suffered in her youth. When she married Robert, he provided her with the love and reassurance she craved for and the two settled down in a pretty house in the grounds of the public school where Robert was a master.

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: A plot to flood Britain with counterfeit notes is discovered by the CIA in Paris. A suspect who resembles the gang leader, Chancellor, is arrested and is persuaded to take on his identity in order to infiltrate the gang and foil their plan.

programme.desc: Sheldon's search for a comic book leads him to a breakthrough. Also, Georgie and Mandy have an uncomfortable first encounter with her parents, Jim and Audrey.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: When Dave starts researching his genealogy, he makes a surprising discovery: he and Calvin are more than just neighbors. Also, Tina offers to help Gemma when she's overcome with morning sickness, and inadvertently stumbles on a new business idea.

programme.title: Live It Up
programme.desc: A news-style show featuring information that viewers can appreciate and use every day.

programme.title: Wisconsin Women
programme.desc: Follow the journeys of women from Wisconsin as they break into the craft beer industry, becoming brewers and growers in a traditionally male-dominated field.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid Programming.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid Programming.

programme.title: Nashville Insider
programme.desc: A sneak peek at all things country music.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team reopens the case of an Amish teenager who was murdered just weeks after leaving home for Philadelphia to experience rumspringa.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The current investigation of a murdered man links to a cold case involving a young woman killed after leaving a political event on Election night.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Rush and Valens reopen the 1985 case of a wealthy stock broker killed during an apparent carjacking gone awry.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A court psychologist asks Rush to investigate the homicide of a woman who was murdered in front of his client.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team gets an anonymous letter saying the 1999 accidental death of a swim coach at a military academy was the result of a carefully orchestrated plot.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: DNA evidence prompts Rush and Valens to reopen the murder case of a beautiful 15-year-old girl who had a number of admirers, young and old.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Rush revisits her first crime scene when reopening a triple homicide case at a now-condemned restaurant in a blighted part of town.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A reunion of World War II factory workers stirs up memories of a mysterious death, and a friend of the deceased begs Lilly to investigate the killing.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lilly receives a home movie in which a runaway teen is apparently shot and killed, prompting her to take another look at the 1979 case.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Human bones are found at the site of a now shuttered prison, the scene of melee and murder 36 years before.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: During the approach of the most powerful storm in decades, university professor Dr. Jo Harding (Helen Hunt) and an underfunded team of students prepare the prototype for Dorothy, a ground-breaking tornado data-gathering device conceived by her estranged husband, Bill (Bill Paxton). When Harding tells Bill that Dorothy is ready for testing -- and that their privately funded rival Dr. Jonas Miller (Cary Elwes) has stolen the idea and built his own -- Bill rejoins the team for one last mission.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: After making a speech in Moscow vowing to never negotiate with terrorists, President James Marshall boards Air Force One with his family and advisers. When a group of terrorists led by Ivan Korshunov hijacks the flight, the President's principles are put to the test. Feigning escape, ex-solider Marshall stows away in the aircraft and must race against time to rescue his family and everyone else on board.

programme.title: Live: U.S. Soccer Pregame
programme.desc: A preview of upcoming U.S. National Soccer team action.

programme.title: Live: Men's International Soccer Friendlies
programme.desc: From Q2 Stadium in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: Live: U.S. Soccer Postgame
programme.desc: Analysis and highlights from a U.S. national team soccer match.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: During the approach of the most powerful storm in decades, university professor Dr. Jo Harding (Helen Hunt) and an underfunded team of students prepare the prototype for Dorothy, a ground-breaking tornado data-gathering device conceived by her estranged husband, Bill (Bill Paxton). When Harding tells Bill that Dorothy is ready for testing -- and that their privately funded rival Dr. Jonas Miller (Cary Elwes) has stolen the idea and built his own -- Bill rejoins the team for one last mission.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Arthur, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Arthur must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep sea.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team reopens the 1953 murder case of a 19-year-old aspiring rock 'n' roller when new evidence suggests he was not killed where his body was found.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: While investigating a Jane Doe's murder, the team discovers that she was a grifter with a male partner and numerous vengeful victims.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A gold bracelet turns up, prompting Lilly to reopen the case of two Cambodian immigrants believed to have been murdered during a robbery.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The strangulation of a young woman mirrors the unsolved case of a 12-year-old girl in 1989, murdered at the home of a troubled teenager (Carly Schroeder).

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A long-term AIDS survivor asks Rush and Valens to reopen the case involving his murdered partner, an AIDS activist and scorned member of a prominent family.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The communist witch hunts of the 1950s come back to haunt their survivors when Lilly and the team reopen an unsolved murder case.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lily discovers nine decapitated female bodies while investigating a case originally sent to the Missing Persons Division in 1985.

programme.title: Big 12 Uncovered
programme.desc: We talk about headlines and unforgettable moments from the past.

programme.title: Live: Big 12 Football Pregame
programme.desc: Champ Bailey, Takeo Spikes, Victor Cruz and Adam Lefkoe preview the Big 12 football game of the week.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Cougars (4-1, 1-1 Big 12) clash with the Cowboys (1-4, 0-2) at Boone Pickens Stadium. Houston comes off a 35-11 setback to rival and then-No. 11 Texas Tech on Oct. 4. Oklahoma State is 0-2 since parting ways with longtime head coach Mike Gundy.

programme.title: Live: Big 12 Football Postgame
programme.desc: Champ Bailey, Takeo Spikes, Victor Cruz and Adam Lefkoe wrap up the night in the Big 12.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: The sequel to the Golden Globe-nominated and AFI Award-winning "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring," "The Two Towers" follows the continuing quest of Frodo (Elijah Wood) and the Fellowship to destroy the One Ring. Frodo and Sam (Sean Astin) discover they are being followed by the mysterious Gollum. Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), the Elf archer Legolas and Gimli the Dwarf encounter the besieged Rohan kingdom, whose once great King Theoden has fallen under Saruman's deadly spell.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Collision
programme.desc: Orange Cassidy leads the Conglomeration in battle against the Don Callis Family; Kris Statlander is face-to-face with Toni Storm; Eddie Kingston vs. Dralístico; Jamie Hayter collides with Anna Jay; Kevin Knight faces a member of FTR.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Arthur, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Arthur must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep sea.

programme.title: 21 Bridges
programme.desc: After uncovering a massive conspiracy, an embattled NYPD detective joins a citywide manhunt for two young cop killers. As the night unfolds, he soon becomes unsure of who to pursue -- and who's in pursuit of him. When the search intensifies, authorities decide to take extreme measures by closing all of Manhattan's 21 bridges to prevent the suspects from escaping.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team reopens the 1992 case of a 14-year-old inner-city math genius who was shot after his older brother started using him for the illegal benefit of a local gang.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team probes the murder of a woman who made headlines when she vanished on Halloween 1938, the night of Orson Welles' "War of the Worlds" radio broadcast, while her family was preparing to escape the Martian invasion.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The bodies of four missing boys are found in a rented storage unit, sending the team in search of a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: When a prominent district attorney is posthumously linked to a scandal, Lilly reinvestigates his unsolved murder.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: In light of a new fatality, a cult member's 1978 suicide is re-examined.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: The future of civilization rests in the fate of the One Ring, which has been lost for centuries. Powerful forces are unrelenting in their search for it. But fate has placed it in the hands of a young Hobbit named Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood), who inherits the Ring and steps into legend. A daunting task lies ahead for Frodo when he becomes the Ringbearer - to destroy the One Ring in the fires of Mount Doom where it was forged.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: The sequel to the Golden Globe-nominated and AFI Award-winning "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring," "The Two Towers" follows the continuing quest of Frodo (Elijah Wood) and the Fellowship to destroy the One Ring. Frodo and Sam (Sean Astin) discover they are being followed by the mysterious Gollum. Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), the Elf archer Legolas and Gimli the Dwarf encounter the besieged Rohan kingdom, whose once great King Theoden has fallen under Saruman's deadly spell.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: The culmination of nearly 10 years' work and conclusion to Peter Jackson's epic trilogy based on the timeless J.R.R. Tolkien classic, "The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King" presents the final confrontation between the forces of good and evil fighting for control of the future of Middle-earth. Hobbits Frodo and Sam reach Mordor in their quest to destroy the `one ring', while Aragorn leads the forces of good against Sauron's evil army at the stone city of Minas Tirith.

programme.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
programme.desc: It is 1941 and the world is in the throes of war. Steve Rogers (Chris Evans) wants to do his part and join America's armed forces, but the military rejects him because of his small stature. Finally, Steve gets his chance when he is accepted into an experimental program that turns him into a supersoldier called Captain America. Joining forces with Bucky Barnes (Sebastian Stan) and Peggy Carter (Hayley Atwell), Captain America leads the fight against the Nazi-backed HYDRA organization.

programme.title: 21 Bridges
programme.desc: After uncovering a massive conspiracy, an embattled NYPD detective joins a citywide manhunt for two young cop killers. As the night unfolds, he soon becomes unsure of who to pursue -- and who's in pursuit of him. When the search intensifies, authorities decide to take extreme measures by closing all of Manhattan's 21 bridges to prevent the suspects from escaping.

programme.title: Irrational Treasure
programme.desc: The elusive Eye of Confusion has been located, but the dream chasers are not alone in their pursuit. With the Never Witch's doppelgangers on their heels, the team embarks on a frantic treasure hunt.

programme.title: Mission Inplausible
programme.desc: As the Eye of Confusion's power threatens to unravel reality, Logan and Astrid are forced to confront their deepest fears in the Dream Forge.

programme.title: Music “Battle of the Stars”
programme.desc: Nova pulls off a series of pranks, leaving her friends scrambling and laughing. However, things take a dark turn when one of her pranks goes awry and sends the group into a terrifying situation.

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win “The Blade Cup” where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: Marvel Superheroes
programme.desc: Loki arrives at Avengers Tower declaring he wants to be an Avenger. Our heroes are skeptical, but Iron Man decides to make Loki an ”Avenger In Training”. It's a great plan until Thanos arrives on Earth looking for Loki

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap…is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: “The Book of Destruction.” With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous

programme.title: Gorilla's Gone Wild
programme.desc: Cragger angers the Gorilla tribe and they march to the Crocodile Swamp to teach him a lesson. But the Gorilla Mechs are not fit for the swampy water and the Lions and Eagles must come to the rescue. The only problem is that the Lions don't like water ... at all!

programme.title: The Haunted and the Hunted!
programme.desc: Something mysterious lurking the jungle wrecks a construction site, and Hudson is convinced a ghost is responsible - but it might be something even more surprising.

programme.title: The Snowball Effect
programme.desc: Laval and Li'Ella's relationship grows as he gives her a tour of the Lion City. But distracted, he misses a key battle against the Hunters. Tormak joins the fight and saves the day. But the Lion King Lagravis is captured and brought to the Ice Fort. Who will lead the Lions now?!?

programme.title: Chaos Unchained
programme.desc: The Ninja hurry to the First Land to stop the Forbidden Five from freeing ThunderFang, and Wyldfyre discovers a drastic cure to Roby's decay.

programme.title: The Shatter Dragon
programme.desc: ThunderFang is freed, and only the Ninja stand between the Shatter Dragon of Chaos and his revenge.

programme.title: Prophecy Of The Green Ninja, Greatest Battles
programme.desc: So the final puzzle forces ninja to question the true meaning of the Green Ninja Prophecy. Solving the puzzles releases a new peril for the Ninja to face. Will memories of their greatest victories be enough to defeat it?

programme.title: The Power and the Peril!
programme.desc: Rock star mathematician Ian Malcolm returns to Isla Nublar and helps Claire, Owen and Hudson deal with strange power surges all over Jurassic World.

programme.title: Fistful of Doppelgangers
programme.desc: The Candy Realm is under siege, and the dream chasers are tasked with saving its sugary inhabitants. As they orchestrate a mass evacuation, Mateo and Astrid sneak into the Midnight Raven.

programme.title: Friends Reunite
programme.desc: Olly about how his obsession is affecting their relationships. Olly refuses to see the damage he's causing, but it becomes clear that he's lost touch with what really matters.

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon – but can they trust him?

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Maximum Overload
programme.desc: Spider-Man and Marvel's Super Heroes take on a mischievous Loki and a team of super villains in an all-new LEGO adventure

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro – in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way – they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go “back to school” to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much “fish out of water” at the academy, even with the “cool kids” – Robin and Ava – showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and t

programme.title: The CHI Jackers
programme.desc: The Wolves have become strong because of the stolen CHI. And now they are stealing even more. Soon all the other tribes of CHIMA have none. Laval and Eris must find a new, clever and “Wolf proof ” way to get CHI to the tribes.

programme.title: Symptoms!
programme.desc: Owen falls prey to the toxin of a poisonous prehistoric jungle flower and believes he's a raptor.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: The Ninja follow a clue to Arin's location but find a new threat, while Nya, Kai and Wyldfyre spark old grudges in their search for Jay.

programme.title: The Ultimate Object of Admiration
programme.desc: Arin nurses Ras back to health as they continue his training, meanwhile their trail leads the Ninja into more danger.

programme.title: Legacy, Vehicle and Mechs
programme.desc: Zane takes help from Nya for backup memories of their adventures to the Samurai X Cave computer, but Zane encounters a mysterious puzzle buried deep within his code. Nya digitizes Jay and uploads him into Zane's mind. Jay reviews memories of the Ninja's various motorcycles, mechs and planes in order to solve the vehicle-themed puzzle.

programme.title: Spit Take!
programme.desc: A Dilophosaurus runs loose in the park's hotel, and Owen and Claire must find it before the guests notice - and before Vic's dino-hunting security team can damage the hotel and the guests.

programme.title: Grim Vengeance
programme.desc: The Never Witch's ambitions have darkened, leading her to target the Grim Realm. In an unlikely alliance, the dream chasers must join forces with the Nightmare King and his grimspawn minions.

programme.title: Crown Control
programme.desc: The dream chasers stumble upon the fabled Crown of Control with surprising ease, thanks to an unexpected encounter with the King of the Creatures.

programme.title: The Promised Crown Affair
programme.desc: Izzie has vanished into the dream world, and the dream chasers struggle to maintain normalcy in the waking world while secretly searching for her.

programme.title: Mile 22
programme.desc: CIA operative James Silva leads a small but lethal paramilitary team on an urgent and dangerous mission. They must transport a foreign intelligence asset from an American embassy in Southeast Asia to an airfield for extraction -- a distance of 22 miles. Silva and the soldiers soon find themselves in a race against time as the city's military, police and street gangs close in to reclaim the asset.

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
programme.desc: The world's top protection agent is called upon to guard the life of his mortal enemy, one of the world's most notorious hit men. The relentless bodyguard and manipulative assassin have been on the opposite end of the bullet for years and are thrown together for a wildly outrageous 24 hours. During their journey from England to the Hague, they encounter high-speed car chases, outlandish boat escapades and a merciless Eastern European dictator who is out for blood.

programme.desc: Gary "Eggsy" Unwin (Taron Egerton), whose late father secretly worked for a spy organization, lives in a South London housing estate and seems headed for a life behind bars. However, dapper agent Harry Hart (Colin Firth) recognizes potential in the youth and recruits him to be a trainee in the secret service. Meanwhile, villainous Richmond Valentine (Samuel L. Jackson) launches a diabolical plan to solve the problem of climate change via a worldwide killing spree.

But something has gone wrong, as the system built to protect Earth is attacking it and it becomes a race against the clock to uncover the real threat before a worldwide geostorm wipes out everything and everyone along with it.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: After making a speech in Moscow vowing to never negotiate with terrorists, President James Marshall boards Air Force One with his family and advisers. When a group of terrorists led by Ivan Korshunov hijacks the flight, the President's principles are put to the test. Feigning escape, ex-solider Marshall stows away in the aircraft and must race against time to rescue his family and everyone else on board.

programme.title: Creed
programme.desc: Adonis Johnson (Michael B. Jordan) never knew his famous father, boxing champion Apollo Creed, who died before Adonis was born. However, boxing is in his blood, so he seeks out Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) and asks the retired champ to be his trainer. Rocky sees much of Apollo in Adonis, and agrees to mentor him, even as he battles an opponent deadlier than any in the ring. With Rocky's help, Adonis soon gets a title shot, but whether he has the true heart of a fighter remains to be seen.

programme.title: Creed II
programme.desc: In 1985, Russian boxer Ivan Drago killed former U.S. champion Apollo Creed in a tragic match that stunned the world. Against the wishes of trainer Rocky Balboa, Apollo's son Adonis Johnson accepts a challenge from Drago's son -- another dangerous fighter. Under guidance from Rocky, Adonis trains for the showdown of his life -- a date with destiny that soon becomes his obsession. Now, Johnson and Balboa must confront their shared legacy as the past catches up to both men.

programme.title: Creed III
programme.desc: Still dominating the boxing world, Adonis Creed is thriving in his career and family life. When Damian, a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy resurfaces after serving time in prison, he's eager to prove that he deserves his shot in the ring. The face-off between former friends is more than just a fight. To settle the score, Adonis must put his future on the line to battle Damian -- a fighter who has nothing to lose.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: After making a speech in Moscow vowing to never negotiate with terrorists, President James Marshall boards Air Force One with his family and advisers. When a group of terrorists led by Ivan Korshunov hijacks the flight, the President's principles are put to the test. Feigning escape, ex-solider Marshall stows away in the aircraft and must race against time to rescue his family and everyone else on board.

programme.title: Crimes Of Passion
programme.desc: (2005) Crime thriller with Dina Meyer. Two greedy employees fake a sexual harassment suit for cash, but their scheme unravels as lies spiral out of control - with a detective hot on their trail.

programme.title: Picture Perfect Lies

programme.title: Framed By My Sister

programme.desc: (2021) Thriller with Revell Carpenter. When nanny Kimberly uncovers her employer's affair with a lady who later turns up dead, she dives into the couple's dark secrets, fearing she might be next.

programme.title: Nightmare Neighbourhood Moms
programme.desc: (2021) Thriller starring Gina Simms. After a neighbour is killed in a botched robbery, a woman launches a neighbourhood watch - only to uncover secrets far more dangerous than she expected.

programme.title: Brightburn
programme.desc: After a difficult struggle with fertility, Tori Breyer's dreams of motherhood come true with the arrival of a mysterious baby boy. Brandon appears to be everything Tori and her husband, Kyle, ever wanted -- bright, talented and curious about the world. But as Brandon nears puberty, powerful darkness manifests within him, and Tori becomes consumed by terrible doubts about her son. Once Brandon begins to act on his twisted urges, those closest to him find themselves in grave danger.

programme.title: Horizon Line
programme.desc: Former couple Sara and Jackson board a single-engine plane for a routine and casual flight to their friend's tropical island wedding. However, within minutes after takeoff, their pilot suffers a fatal heart attack, leaving them with no idea where they are, and no clue how to land the plane. With nothing but miles of ocean and sky in every direction, and a terrifying storm that's about to envelop them, Sara and Jackson have only one shot -- and there's no going back.

programme.title: Firestarter
programme.desc: A couple desperately try to hide their daughter, Charlie, from a shadowy federal agency that wants to harness her unprecedented gift for turning fire into a weapon of mass destruction. Her father taught her how to defuse her power, but as Charlie turns 11, the fire becomes harder and harder to control. When a mysterious operative finally finds the family, he tries to seize Charlie once and for all -- but she has other plans.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Sarah (Elizabeth Olsen) is working with her father (Adam Trese) and uncle (Eric Sheffer Stevens) to renovate an old family home to prepare it for sale. Long vacant, the house has no utilities, forcing the trio to rely on battery-operated lanterns to light their way. Sarah becomes separated from her relatives and soon finds she is trapped inside the cabin, with no contact with the outside world. Panic turns to real terror as the young woman experiences events that become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: A man and his sister discover something sinister in the skies above their California horse ranch, while the owner of a nearby theme park tries to profit from the mysterious, otherworldly phenomenon.

programme.title: Winchester
programme.desc: The most haunted house in the world sits on an isolated stretch of land that's 50 miles outside of San Francisco. Built by Sarah Winchester, heiress to the Winchester fortune, it stands seven stories tall and contains hundreds of rooms. To an outsider, it looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah's actually building a prison, an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts -- and the most terrifying among them have a score to settle with the Winchesters.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Photographer Adam Stanheight (Leigh Whannell) and oncologist Lawrence Gordon (Cary Elwes) regain consciousness while chained to pipes at either end of a filthy bathroom. As the two men realize they've been trapped by a sadistic serial killer nicknamed "Jigsaw" and must complete his perverse puzzle to live, flashbacks relate the fates of his previous victims. Meanwhile, Dr. Gordon's wife (Monica Potter) and young daughter (Makenzie Vega) are forced to watch his torture via closed-circuit video.

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: Political pressure mounts to install a system of accountability when the actions of the Avengers lead to collateral damage. The new status quo deeply divides members of the team. Captain America (Chris Evans) believes superheroes should remain free to defend humanity without government interference. Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.) sharply disagrees and supports oversight. As the debate escalates into an all-out feud, Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) and Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner) must pick a side.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Two centuries after Dr. Frankenstein assembles and reanimates his creature, Adam (Aaron Eckhart) is still living. He becomes embroiled in a war between two immortal races: gargoyles, the traditional protectors of mankind, and evil demons. Since Adam is neither human nor demon, gargoyle Queen Leonore (Miranda Otto) and demon Prince Naberius (Bill Nighy) each want him for their own purposes. It is up to Adam to discover his inner humanity and the reason for his continued existence.

programme.title: Winchester

But Sarah's actually building a prison, an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts -- and the most terrifying among them have a score to settle with the Winchesters.

In present day, an artist begins to explore the macabre history of Candyman, not knowing it would unravel his sanity and unleash a terrifying wave of violence that puts him on a collision course with destiny.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: After a virus turns most people into zombies, the world's surviving humans remain locked in an ongoing battle against the hungry undead. Four survivors -- Tallahassee (Woody Harrelson) and his cohorts Columbus (Jesse Eisenberg), Wichita (Emma Stone) and Little Rock (Abigail Breslin) -- abide by a list of survival rules and zombie-killing strategies as they make their way toward a rumored safe haven in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: Iron Man, Thor, the Hulk and the rest of the Avengers unite to battle their most powerful enemy yet -- the evil Thanos. On a mission to collect all six Infinity Stones, Thanos plans to use the artifacts to inflict his twisted will on reality. The fate of the planet and existence itself has never been more uncertain as everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment.

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: On the hunt for the twisted vigilante and serial killer Jigsaw, Detective Eric Matthews and his team must apprehend the elusive murderer to rescue eight people trapped in an abandoned house, before they succumb to his torturous and murderous games. One twist to this task is that Matthews' own son, Daniel, is among the eight people Jigsaw has chosen to test for their lack of morality. With nerve gas pumping through the house, every second counts.

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: Dr. Lynn Denlon (Bahar Soomekh) becomes a pawn in the Jigsaw Killer's (Tobin Bell) latest gory game. Kidnapped and taken to an abandoned warehouse, she finds Jigsaw bedridden and dying. Her task is to keep the maniac alive long enough for Jeff (Angus Macfadyen), a fellow victim, to complete his own task. Each is unaware that Jigsaw has much bigger -- and deadlier -- plans in store.

programme.title: Exorcist: The Beginning
programme.desc: Father Merrin (Stellan Skarsgard) is haunted by his experiences in World War II, when occupying Nazi troops forced him to be complicit in their atrocities. In the aftermath, he has renounced his faith and begun working as an archaeologist. He travels to Kenya, where a fifth-century Byzantine church holds ancient relics. There he encounters Sarah (Izabella Scorupco), a doctor and concentration camp survivor. The strange occurrences that soon begin reunite him with the evil he sought to escape.

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: Dr. Lynn Denlon (Bahar Soomekh) becomes a pawn in the Jigsaw Killer's (Tobin Bell) latest gory game. programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe) third year at Hogwarts starts off badly when he learns deranged killer Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban prison and is bent on murdering the teenage wizard. While Hermione's (Emma Watson) cat torments Ron's (Rupert Grint) sickly rat, causing a rift among the trio, a swarm of nasty Dementors is sent to protect the school from Black. A mysterious new teacher helps Harry learn to defend himself, but what is his secret tie to Sirius Black?

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut
programme.desc: When their son Matt (Kyle Gallner) receives a diagnosis of cancer, Sara (Virginia Madsen) and Peter (Martin Donovan) Campbell move to Connecticut to be closer to his doctors. At first all is well, but then Matt becomes increasingly disturbed by what appears to be paranormal activity. Sara turns to a priest for help, and the ghosts are seemingly banished -- but Matt's condition takes a sudden and unexplained turn for the worse, and the lives of Sara and the rest of her family are endangered.

programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8 mm `snuff' films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British family's idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince, is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Dracula's castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harker's fiancée, Mina, the spitting image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit `The China Syndrome' to M Night Shyamalan's 2024 blockbuster `Trap'.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic warriors must rely on their wits and weapons more than ever as they find themselves in a relentless battle against smarter, faster and seemingly indestructible zombies.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: It's been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Laurie's ready for him.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a family's pet cat is killed, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which is believed to revive the dead. However, in doing so, they create a monster.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: Tony and Felix own a tramp boat and run jobs for people in the Caribbean. When they agree to transport the mysterious Irena to another island it drives a wedge between them and Tony swears vengeance against Felix for stealing her. However, Felix has other ideas.

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: In 17th-century England, Charles Stuart rallies a group of supporters in opposition to Oliver Cromwell's Roundheads.

programme.title: Saraband for Dead Lovers
programme.desc: A star-crossed romance develops between an unhappily married princess and a Swedish nobleman.

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: A luckless naval Lieutenant is duped into commanding a dangerous mission into enemy territory during the Bismarck Sea Battle, but his boat is barely shipshape, and his crew turns out to be a bunch of wise-cracking landlubbers.

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: With a dog named Lulu by his side, Army Ranger Briggs races down the Pacific Coast to make it to a soldier's funeral on time. Along the way, Briggs and Lulu drive each other completely crazy, break a handful of laws and narrowly evade death.

programme.title: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: Déjà vu is what unexpectedly guides agent Doug Carlin through an investigation into a crime. After an explosion in New Orleans, Doug is called to check and recover the evidence, but Carlin's enquiries uncover a connection between the bomb accelerant and the body of a local girl named Claire Kuchever. Things become even stranger when Doug hears his own voice on Claire's answering machine.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: In a Mexico City wracked by a recent wave of kidnappings, ex-CIA operative John Creasy reluctantly accepts a job as a bodyguard for 9-year-old Lupita, the daughter of wealthy businessman Samuel Ramos. Just as Creasy begins to develop a fondness for the young girl, a bloodthirsty gunman kidnaps her. Now, Creasy must pick off a succession of corrupt cops and criminals to reach his ultimate object of vengeance.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: On a night-time motorway journey, young couple Zakes and Beth catch a horrifying glimpse of a young woman imprisoned in the back of a truck. When the two stop at a service station, Beth goes missing and a terrified Zakes races to track her down, fearing she has become the driver's next victim.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: On a day like no other, the wealthy Cotwell couple's baby boy scrambles unaccompanied across the bustling cityscapes of Chicago, with three slow-witted kidnappers on his tail.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: A boy discovers he is `The Seeker', the last in a line of time-travelling peacekeepers who must fight against the evil Dark.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Bitten by a radioactive spider, teenager Miles Morales suddenly develops mysterious powers that transform him into Spider-Man. He must now use his newfound skills to battle the evil Kingpin, a hulking madman who can open portals to other universes.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an elite 51-year-old assassin who's ready to call it quits after completing his 72nd job. His plans get turned upside down when he becomes the target of a mysterious operative who can seemingly predict his every move. To his horror, Brogan soon learns that the man who's trying to kill him is a younger, faster, cloned version of himself.

After crashing on an unknown planet, two survivors quickly discover they're actually stranded on Earth, 65 million years ago. With only one chance at a rescue, they must make their way across an unknown terrain riddled with prehistoric creatures.

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: Finney is a 13-year-old boy who's being held captive in a soundproof basement by a sadistic, masked killer. When a disconnected phone on the wall starts to ring, he soon discovers that he can hear the voices of the murderer's previous victims.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: Haunting tale which centres on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from heaven. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill
programme.desc: The comic tale of a failed sailor who sparks jealousies in a seaside community when he strikes it big in the end-of-the-pier entertainment trade. Captain Ambrose comes from a long line of seafarers, but can't be a sailor due to his seasickness, so he sets up store in a small British town, Sandcastle-on-Sea.

programme.title: The Borrowers
programme.desc: A four-inch-tall family live beneath the floorboards of a human house. The family's future is threatened when the house falls into the hands of an evil lawyer who plans to destroy it.

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: Nicknamed the `Tooth Fairy' due to his penchant for knocking out other players' teeth, an arrogant hockey player's moniker becomes very apt when he steals a dollar that his girlfriend Carly's daughter has left for the real Tooth Fairy. Sprouting wings, Derek is summoned to meet the leader of the fairies, Lily, who labels him a `dream crusher' and orders him to serve as a tooth fairy to make up for his transgressions.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies: Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: Detective Scott Turner is an uptight, by-the-book police officer who hopes to leave his sleepy California town and work in the big city. When his friend Amos Reed, the proprietor of a junkyard, is killed, Turner reluctantly inherits the man's dog. Realising that the canine may be able to help him solve the murder case, Turner attempts to adjust to life with the big dog, resulting in much household destruction and unwelcome chaos.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee the Autobot finds refuge in a junkyard in a small California beach town. When 17-year-old Charlie revives him, she quickly learns that this is no ordinary yellow Volkswagen.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: Pete Mitchell keeps pushing the envelope after years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators. He must soon confront the past while training a new squad of graduates for a dangerous mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Infinite
programme.desc: Haunted by memories of places he's never visited, a man joins forces with a group of reborn warriors to stop a madman from destroying the endless cycle of life and reincarnation.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: Next of Kin
programme.desc: Margot, a young woman who was abandoned by her mother as a baby, travels to a secluded Amish community with a documentary film crew seeking answers about her mother and extended family.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: Historical epic spectacularly reenacting the heroic efforts of a handful of Spartan soldiers against the full might of the Persian army at Thermopylae in 480 BC.

programme.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
programme.desc: On his deathbed, King Henry VIII recalls how he wooed and wed his six wives - and disposed of five of them - in a bid to secure the succession to the throne with a male heir. Despite his many marriages and the crowded Court, Henry remains essentially lonely.

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: A sheriff-turned-bounty hunter captures a notorious gunfighter, hoping to flush out his murderous brother and provoke a bloody shoot-out, but he finds several others are following the same prey.

programme.title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
programme.desc: When his mother eloped with an Italian opera singer, Louis Mazzini was cut off from her aristocratic family. After the family refuses to let her be buried in the family mausoleum, Louis avenges his mother's death by attempting to murder every family member who stands between himself and the family fortune. But when he finds himself torn between his longtime love and the widow of one of his victims, his plans go awry.

programme.title: Land
programme.desc: A local hunter brings a grieving lawyer back from the brink of death after she retreats to the harsh wilderness of the Rockies.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Two European knights of fortune have traveled to China in their search for a magical black powder that can wreak havoc. When they suddenly come under attack by some monstrous figures, they seek refuge.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: Adela and her husband, Juan, live in Texas, where he works as a ranch hand for the wealthy Tucker family. On the morning after the Purge, a masked gang of killers attacks the Tuckers, forcing both families to band together and fight back.

programme.title: Piggy
programme.desc: Sara is an overweight teen who witnesses a stranger kidnap a clique of girls who bully her on a regular basis. When police start asking questions, Sara keeps quiet as she's torn between revealing the truth or protecting the man who saved her.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: 13 rue Madeleine
programme.desc: Rough and tough OSS agent Bob Sharkey oversees a special mission to determine the location of the factory where the Nazis are manufacturing their notorious flying bombs. When a treacherous double agent murders one of the OSS recruits, Bob leaves London to personally lead the mission, centred in Paris. Based on actual OSS accounts and use of intelligence agency footage.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: A soldier turned pacifist, recently returned from a bloody war, is forced into a confrontation with a bullying cattle baron. The disabled cattleman uses violence and scare tactics to push out smaller ranchers and farmers.

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: A lovable Catholic priest sets out to retrieve the priceless cross stolen by a thief named Flambeau during a trip to Rome. However, Father Brown is not an ordinary churchman, and the thief meets his match.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Ebenezer Scrooge, a spiteful and miserly man, encounters three spirits on Christmas Eve who show him the folly of his ways.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Thirty years ago, Clifford McBride led a voyage into space, but the ship and crew was never heard from again. Now, his son must embark on a daring mission to uncover the truth about his father and a mysterious power surge that threatens the universe.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto [NEW]
programme.desc: Otto, a crotchety, irritable, and fiercely strict widower, lives a lonely life, judging everyone he sees. When he forms an unlikely friendship with his new neighbours, Otto begins to change.

programme.title: Nuns on the Run
programme.desc: Small-time crooks are forced to hide out in a convent disguised as nuns, when they are pursued by gangsters and the police after parting their ruthless boss Robert Patterson from the £1 million he stole from a Triad gang in London.

programme.title: The Eyes of Tammy Faye
programme.desc: In the 1970s, Tammy Faye Bakker and her husband, Jim, rise from humble beginnings to create the world's largest religious broadcasting network. However, financial improprieties, scheming rivals and a scandal soon threaten to topple their empire.

programme.title: The Tall Texan
programme.desc: Five travelers - a tinhorn and his lover, a sheriff with a prisoner, and a sea captain with a murky past—cross Comanche country. When a renegade Indian reveals a hidden gold field to repay their kindness, greed takes over, sparking tension and dangerous decisions as the group's true motives are laid bare.

programme.title: Running Target
programme.desc: In the Colorado Rockies, Sheriff Scott, heads a posse that is after four escaped convicts, and thought it is his sworn duty to return the men dead or alive, he is, as always, reluctant to kill his fellow man.

programme.title: Bandidos
programme.desc: Renowned gunman Richard Martin is traveling on a train, held up by Billy Kane, a former student of Martin's. Kane spares Martin, but only after shooting his hands. Years later, Martin meets an escaped convict, wrongly convicted for the train robbery. Martin trains his new student and both men seek out Billy Kane.

programme.title: I'll Die for Vengeance
programme.desc: A Mexican gang headed by vicious Pedro terrorizes the land between New Mexico and Arizona.

programme.title: Man Who Cried for Revenge
programme.desc: Davy Flanagan, a former Union officer who was part of an attempt to break out of a Confederate prison camp during the Civil War and suffered a blow to the head that left him with amnesia. Then a bounty hunter shows up to collect a bounty on his head as a deserter.

programme.title: In a Colt's Shadow
programme.desc: A story about two gunfighters, Duke and Steve. Steve is in love with Duke's daughter but Duke disapproves of the match, envisioning a life of hardship and danger for the girl if she marries Steve.

programme.title: Four Rode Out
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal sets out to bring in a Mexican bandit accused of killing his girlfriend's father, but it turns out that there's more to the story than there first appears to be.

programme.title: Buckskin Frontier
programme.desc: A railroad man and the owner of a freight line battle for control of a crucial mountain pass.

programme.title: Troublemakers
programme.desc: Two brothers who hate each other are going to spend Christmas with their mother. She tries to get them together.

programme.title: Gentleman Killer
programme.desc: A quiet border town erupts into chaos as tensions rise between the US and Mexico. The cause? A ruthless Mexican bandit determined to kill as many US soldiers as possible. As political turmoil intensifies, the town becomes the center of a deadly conflict, where vengeance, power, and survival collide.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E05-08
programme.desc: In one of television's first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: Billy the Kid Versus Dracula
programme.desc: Dracula arrives in the Old West, setting his sights on a young ranch owner. Her fiancé, Billy the Kid, is warned of the vampire's true nature but struggles to convince others. As Dracula tightens his grip, Billy must act fast to save his bride-to-be before it's too late.

programme.title: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Wells Fargo hires pistoleros to protect against increasing banditry. Jeff Sullivan, driven by revenge for the brutal murder of his wife by Glenn Kovacks and his gang, joins the effort. Sullivan partners with Pancho Corrales and pursues Kovacks, using Kovacks' stepbrother, Dan, as leverage. Their final confrontation leads to a deadly showdown.

programme.title: Bury Me Not
programme.desc: Two women hide the surprising truth as a sheriff investigates a murder.
